name: Daedalic Turn-Based Bundle
description: This bundle contains three turn-based games for you to plan and execute your perfect strategies!

name: Abyss: Backrooms Pools Horror
description: Sin descripción

name: SCP-087 The Stairwell Horror
description: Face your Fears

name: Homecoming: Kitaku
description: Uncover the truth hidden in the darkness with your own hands.

name: Hakkaku Doku
description: Bee's Hexa Hive Adventure

name: Eraser vs. Ruler
description:
Which side will you choose?!
Eraser Army VS Ruler Army
The ultimate desktop showdown is about to begin!

name: Eggconsole Guardic MSX
description: A shooting game from COMPILE that requires mapping. Explore the maze and destroy the enemy mothership at the deepest level!

name: Extreme City Delivery: Bike Ride Simulator
description: Who said being a courier is boring? Arrange xtreme city bike races and deliver the order on time!

name: Bimfli & His Time Travels: Paris
description: Bimfli and his time travels is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect. It includes children's reading texts, dynamic images and ambient music.

name: Demon Compass
description: Demon Compass is a third person horror adventure game focused on exploration, light puzzle solving and abstract narration. Navigate through three separate story lines, each with distinct characters, environments, and challenges.

name: Funko Fusion: Invincible Pack
description:
Expand the Invincible universe in Funko Fusion with the Invincible Pack. This pack includes:
Atom Eve - Playable character
Atom Eve - Alternate Eve Outfit
Rex Splode - Playable character
Invincible - Blue Suit Outfit
Omni-Man - Viltrumite Skin

name: Funko Fusion: Trap Jaw
description: Blunder your way through Funko Fusion with Masters of the Universe’ very own metal munching moron Trap Jaw, who is now a playable character!

name: Sniper Jarhead
description: Precision marksmanship and calm decision-making are crucial for this rescue mission. Feel the intense tension as you look through the scope and pull the trigger.

name: The Black Maple Anomaly
description: Another Anomaly, Another Mission. It's your job to work your way down the floors of the Black Maple Motel, Keep track of the anomalies, and reach the Lobby to try and safely close the Anomaly that has enveloped the building.

name: DC Heroes United
description: Sin descripción

name: Christmas Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Sunforge Solar Survival
description:
In "Sunforge Solar Survival," you find yourself in a futuristic world of floating islands, harnessing the power of sunlight to thrive. You'll have the opportunity to build advanced structures, cultivate food, craft innovative gadgets, and embark on airship journeys to explore distant islands suspended in the sky.
Use renewable energy sources such as sunlight, wind, and water to power your creations and automate essential processes like resource gathering and irrigation.
"Sunforge Solar Survival" offers a unique blend of survival gameplay, technical innovation, and exploration, making every moment a quest for sustainable living in a beautiful and challenging environment.

name: Dungeon Crystal
description: Travel the seas, corrupted by evil crystals. Transform into different spirits and animals to solve puzzles. Find hidden treasures and become stronger to defeat the wild monsters. Save the islands by destroying the beautiful but destructive crystals. And take a break while catching some fish on your own sailing ship.

name: Tales Beyond The Tomb: Pineville Night Stalker
description: After her mother's unexpected death, Megan receives a call about a mysterious inheritance awaiting her in the town of Pineville. With her work friend, Lenny, she embarks on a journey that should be simple, but quickly turns into a web of danger and deception.

name: Arcade Archives: Final Blow
description:
"FINAL BLOW" is a sports-action game released by TAITO in 1989.
Players choose one of five boxers and compete against the remaining four to become champion.
In addition to weak, medium, and strong punches, you can also use switch between low and high blow to take advantage of your opponent's openings.
Step into the ring and face the most fearsome fighters in the world!

name: MythWalker
description: Turn any dog walk or errand run into an adventure! MythWalker is a mobile geolocation fantasy RPG that explores Earth’s parallel world, Mytherra. An ethereal mystical being guides players through an overworld traversal system, using real locations to tell the stories of Earth’s myths and legends. Now, Mytherra faces an unknown threat that endangers both worlds. A powerful mysterious being, reaches out for help, recruiting you – the Mythwalker, to uncover the truth, explore the connection between the worlds, and lead Mytherra’s heroes in their defense. Will you answer the call and save both planets?

name: Car Mechanic Shop Simulator
description: Car Mechanic Shop Simulator is a simulation game that offers a comprehensive, in-depth experience combining strategic business management with the technical nuances of car maintenance, making it a must download for enthusiasts and novices alike.

name: Shadowhand Solitaire
description: Ride with Lady Cornelia Darkmoor - aristocrat by day, highwaywoman by night. Play your cards right to untangle a web of corruption, smuggling and blackmail in this swashbuckling solitaire adventure. Your fortune and freedom are at stake!

name: Zero to Dance Hero
description: Become a Dance Hero from Zero! Grab your Joy-Con controllers, and get your body moving to the beat! Learn popular hip-hop dance moves from basic to complex. But you won't be alone on your dancing journey. Four instructors help along the way!

name: Just Skateboard
description: JUST SKATEBOARD is simply a skateboard simulator. Just skate and enjoy the ride.

name: Idol Maker VR
description:
Virtual reality raising simulation game. In Idol Maker VR you have a girl who dreams to become a superstar. You, a rookie guardian angel, have descended to the human world in order to help a girl achieve her earnest dream.

Which paths will your choices lead her down? As her guardian angel, guide her to become the superstar everyone dreams of becoming.

name: Meow Mission
description: Play Meow Mission and solve a variety of puzzles to rescue cats trapped in an outer dimension! The rescued cats will be brought to the Tomcat House, where you can make memories with their unique personalities. Let's go rescue these adorable kitties!

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Tokyo
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Tokio landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: The Cursed Ritual
description: The Cursed Ritual is a horror genre FPS game about a person who gets stuck in the middle of the forest in midnight as his car crashes. With no signal in midnight he wanders through the forest finding a shelter to pass the night and finds an abandoned house. Explore the secrets of the haunted house.

name: EDYN
description: Join the battle for EDYN, the ultimate multiplayer strategy game. Build settlements, command armies, and unify the realms in epic PvP warfare to etch your legacy into history.

name: I'd Kiss That Fish
description: This is a fish dress up game in which you select clothes/ accessories to dress up your fish! It is a casual single player 2D sandbox experience with cute stylized graphics.

name: Prison Princess: Trapped Allure
description: At long last a completely new sequel to Prison Princess, the mystery-solving adventure game where you guide princesses to escape the clutches of the Demon King!

name: Shiina Taki's Decameron
description: Shiina Taki's Decameron is a doujin interactive fiction based on anime「BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!」. The story concentrates on Shiina Taki, the drummer and song writer of MyGO!!!!! and her fight against fate till the last breath.

name: Wall Town Wonders
description: Wall Town Wonders is a mixed reality game that turns your living room into a lively miniature town. Help colorful characters build their world through fun quests and mini-games, unlocking unique buildings and surprises along the way.

name: Shepherds
description: Shepherds is a 3D, two-player co-op musical adventure game in which players control unlikely partners - a shepherd girl named Zoe and a magic wolf named Kin. Players must cleverly combining their unique mastery of musical melodies and distinctive movement styles to solve puzzles.

name: My Imaginary Friend
description:
My imaginaryFriend is a first-person horror game that focuses on psychological horror. Set in the mandela catalogue universe, My Imaginary Friend is a 3d realistic first person horror game that features how AI uses the imagination of children to generate intruders and potentially alternates.
You will be playing as Jonny, 10 year old boy, the game begins after he discovers that his parents are not home and something is terribly wrong with the place.

name: Fantasy Aquarium
description: Fantasy Aquarium offers an effortless way to enhance your gaming experience. You can nurture a diverse range of small fish with unique characteristics and construct a vibrant fantasy world from scratch, transforming mundane fish-keeping into an engaging pursuit.

name: Jack of Clubs
description: Play golf, fight robots, and explore an 18-hole course as Jack, a pilot stranded on a recently-abandoned island resort. Discover secrets and complete challenges to earn items that improve your golf game. Unravel the mystery of the island in pursuit of your golf ball across a huge, continuous course.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Wild Card
description:
In the Star Wars Outlaws: Wild Card narrative expansion, keep exploring the world of Star Wars Outlaws with an all-new story, quests, and areas to discover.

Kay is hired to infiltrate a high-stakes sabacc tournament, but as she crosses paths with the notorious gambler Lando Calrissian, she soon learns that another game is being played.

name: Disney Music Parade Encore
description: Sin descripción

name: Coaching Simulator
description: Coaching Simulator is an educational simulation game that combines study techniques, short and long lesson videos, AI university coaching, English practice NPCs, creative crafting areas. Enhance your learning experience and enjoy diverse activities in a virtual library setting.

name: The Anomaly Project
description: Your goal is simple, spot anomalies to escape. Play alone or together with up to 8 players in online co-op. Make the right decisions to advance to the next level, or risk being reset to the beginning!

name: Jujutsu Kaisen: Cursed Clash - The Shibuya Incident
description: Includes playable characters, character costumes, and additional scenarios for use in Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash.

name: By Grit Alone
description:
Stranded. Tormented. Alone.
By Grit Alone is an action horror shooter combining frantic combat, bosses and challenges with a harrowing sci-fi anthology story.

You’re marooned in a bizarre unknown dimension of space, filled with ancient derelicts and ravenous aliens. Uncover the mysteries of the dead as you move ship to ship, slaughtering your way through hordes of brain starved horrors.

Fight. Discover. Survive.
Experience twisted stories from our incredible writers, with credits including Dead Space, Resident Evil and Dr Who. There's no loading screens, no inventory and unlimited ammo; you’ll need skill and focus to rip through the ferocious swarms and get out of this corrupted hellhole in one piece.

By Grit Alone, you will survive.

name: Ember Souls
description: Ember Souls is a thrilling VR hack-and-slash game blending parkour, climbing and environmental puzzles in a luxurious Persian palace. Harness the power of the Ember Stones to unlock new abilities and use your combat skills and agility to defeat the mysterious Shadow Sultan.

name: Falling With Ice Phoenix!
description: Falling with Ice Phoenix! combining the classic gravity fall platformer, sprited and high-octane action game, you and the cutie monster girls venture downwards to find the lost orb, facing traps and sexy monster lords ahead, an exciting adventure to the unknown lays ahead...

name: Cook For Love
description: Win the hearts of Parisians with your cooking, discover delicious recipes, and become a chef worthy of working onboard the Orient Express.

name: Grocery Store Simulator
description: Run your own grocery store. Scan items, place and stock shelves, set prices, order products, manage your warehouse, and customize your store. Play solo or team up with friends in a 4 player co-op mode to expand your business in this first-person game.

name: I Think
description: One day, the programmer came up with an idea. If he could get AI to learn his diary, he could create himself in the electronic world.

name: Silent
description: It's a different way to feel the emotion of fear. While playing a game, even the slightest sound will cause you to start the game from the beginning. While you are trying to solve a mysterious case, you have an accident on the forest road. You must find a way out of the forest.

name: Autotag
description: Embark on a heart-pounding adventure in Autotag, where classic tag meets a twist of mayhem! Armed with powerful weapons, outsmart opponents in the destructible arena, and prove your skills in intense online multiplayer battles. Are you ready for the ultimate game of tag?

name: Deadly Parkour
description: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey in a modern-classic 2D precision-platformer that pushes the boundaries of your agility and reflexes. Choose between two unique playable characters, each with their own set of skills, as you navigate through intricately designed levels filled with challenges.

name: Skuf Backrooms
description: Have you ever wondered what might be waiting for you when you once again leave the confines of your apartment? And you obviously didn't realize that an ordinary walk to the garbage chute could turn into your nightmare.

name: Small Wars: Mohicans
description: Small Wars: Mohicans offers you a quick and fun to play experience of the French & Indian War (1754-1760) in the vast wilderness of 18th century North America. Play the French and their Indigenous Allies or Britain troops and colonials and gain control of the new world.

name: Staying Fresh
description: Manage the culinary heroes, fight the rotten zombie food. Use fresh food to upgrade and create new defenders. Explore the abandoned kitchen in search of ingredients and new recipes.

name: Dungeon Clawler
description: Dungeon Clawler is a Roguelike Claw Machine Deckbuilder. Build your unique deck, fight enemies by grabbing weapons and items from a claw machine and find special artifacts that help you on your quest to reclaim something you lost... Aim carefully to claw your way through this dungeon!

name: Super Rolling Heroes Deluxe
description: Destroy, bounce, explode! Roll downhill with Super Rolling Heroes Deluxe, a 3D platformer all about maintaining momentum, pulling down every object, avoiding deadly obstacles, and collecting some nice shiny gems too.

name: Follow the Meaning
description: Follow the meaning is a point-and-click puzzle adventure set in a peculiar town filled with folk who feel increasingly threatened by the rising authority of the Hospital and its Doctors. What is happening on the other side of the wall? Join detective Paul Trilby and help solve this crisis!

name: Garage Works
description: Car simulation game where all kinds of handling and performance affecting parts can be changed as well as tested on road or on track.

name: ICBM: Escalation
description: ICBM: Escalation is a real time strategy game of global warfare and nuclear mass destruction. Issue orders to entire armies and wield the most powerful weapons to ever exist to eradicate your enemies and secure global supremacy.

name: Youlogic
description: Indie logic puzzle game

name: Electrogical
description: "Jigsaw Puzzle + Arithmetic" is a casual yet engaging game that appeals to puzzle gamers who enjoy immersive experiences. Customize your gameplay by rearranging "piece placement," "number manipulation," and "score selection" to aim for a high score in each stage.

name: Servonauts
description: Servonauts is an absurd couch co-op fuel-attendant game for up to 4 players. Connect pipes, mix fuels and overcome deadly hazards to meet all the customers demands, or die hilariously while trying.

name: Astral Tracks
description: Astral Tracks is a competitive 3D platforming speedrunner where you run, dash, slide, swing and wall run your way to victory. Compete against friends locally or online and refine your runs to top the leaderboards for each procedurally generated track!

name: Drone Strike: Engineer Simulator
description: Immerse yourself in an adrenaline-fueled adventure where revenge, engineering prowess, and a race against time intertwine to create an unforgettable gaming experience. Join forces with our resilient hero and conquer the path to redemption!

name: Way of the Bullet
description: Shoot, dash and slice your way to victory in this rogue-lite FPS! Discover new weapons, spells and game modes as you progress through a series of procedurally-generated levels. Face hordes of enemies and bosses as you fight solo or in a 3 player co-op.

name: StarSim
description:
Starsim is a sci-fi multi-genre (pausable real-time, text quest, Turn-based tactic) computer game where you can become anyone.

Players explore a partly-randomly generated galaxy, with each sector featuring multiple stars and planets. This leads to a universe with hundreds of planets, each with their own economy, government, and opinion of the player.

The game is not limited by borders and allows players an opportunity to influence the branching storyline. At the same time, the larger and more expansive game world lives and develops by itself. In Starsim players will have an opportunity to test their skills not only in outer space, but in turn-based tactics as well.

name: I.H.A.S
description: Experience story in this FPS Psychological game, shoot at futuristic robots or use your stealth skills to escape, explore and travel between different worlds using portals and find yourself

name: The Last Humble Bee
description: The Last Humble Bee is a heart-buzzing bumble bee rogue-like! Hack and slash demon bugs in high-speed, skill-based gameplay and explore an SNES-inspired pixel art world to find the portal to Hell.

name: The Devil Within: Satgat
description: The Devil Within: Satgat is a 2.5D stylish action adventure that follows the journey of an Eastern warrior infected with demonic blood. Dig into the secrets of a ruined world while taking down enemies in stylish action sequences.

name: Loco Motive
description: Loco Motive is a murder mystery-comedy, full of deadly surprises, larger than life characters and yes, the occasional blood fountain! On the Reuss Express a passenger has been murdered, and you’re the prime suspect. Uncover a thrilling mystery and solve satisfying point and click puzzles to prove your innocence! A slapstick adventure, packed full of deadly surprises, shocking twists and larger than life characters!

name: Alaloth: Champions of the Four Kingdoms
description: Set in a vibrant fantasy world, Alaloth – Champions of The Four Kingdoms offers fast paced action with a deep narrative, developed by a team of industry veterans. The game brings the aRPG dynamics to a new level with a skill based gameplay inspired by great classics such as Moonstone and modern masterpieces as Dark Souls in a gritty, dark, mature environment filled with blood and magic!

name: LSD: Dream Emulator Retro
description: Immerse yourself in a dreamy and psychedelic world through low poly enviroments and liminal spaces. A Retro game influenced by the original LSD: Dream Emulator from PSX.

name: Atari Recharged Bundle: Yars + Caverns of Mars
description: Atari's Recharged series modernizes classic titles with power-ups, challenges, local multiplayer, and all new soundtracks by Megan McDuffee.

name: Atari Recharged Bundle: Gravitar + Missile Command
description: Atari's Recharged series modernizes classic titles with power-ups, challenges, local multiplayer, and all new soundtracks by Megan McDuffee.

name: Atari Recharged Bundle: Centipede + Black Widow
description: Atari's Recharged series modernizes classic titles with power-ups, challenges, local multiplayer, and all new soundtracks by Megan McDuffee.

name: Atari Recharged Bundle: Berzerk + Quantum
description: Atari's Recharged series modernizes classic titles with power-ups, challenges, local multiplayer, and all new soundtracks by Megan McDuffee.

name: Atari Recharged Bundle: Asteroids + Breakout
description: Atari's Recharged series modernizes classic titles with power-ups, challenges, local multiplayer, and all new soundtracks by Megan McDuffee.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Storybook Vale Bundle
description: Explore a magical world in Disney Dreamlight Valley alongside Disney and Pixar friends, and travel to the Storybook Vale, a land made up of fairy tales and myths!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Enchanted Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cop Drop
description:
Inspired by 2048 and merge game mechanics, this fast-paced game will challenge your reflexes and strategy.

Merge police heads to create larger characters!
Avoid getting stuck – if the screen fills up, it’s game over!
Climb the leaderboard and set high scores!
Frenzy Mode – trigger chaos and make rapid merges!

name: Mazzle Christmas
description: Mazzle Christmas is a straightforward yet surprisingly challenging celebration of the simple beauty of mazes and jigsaw puzzles in a Christmas style.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Future Saga: Chapter 2
description: The second chapter in the FUTURE SAGA series depicts an unprecedented alteration of history! Includes new Playable Characters, new Extra Missions, Parallel Quests, Additional Moves, and Costumes!

name: Mini Gunn
description: A fan-made, fun-sized version of Samurai GUNN 2.

name: Junkcity Factory Simulator
description: Collect scraps, manage a factory with 29 machines, 33 workers, and nearly 300 items, and sell your products in Junkcity Store. Optimize efficiency and dominate the market in this dynamic simulation game!

name: Randotura
description: Randotura is a top-down action roguelike with inventory management. Dive into bullet hell action and collect unique modifiers, all in a selfmade dungeon.

name: Your Study Mate
description: If we both get into North University, we can achieve happiness! Of course, if we both pass the lawyer exam, that's not a bad option either (laughs). What's in front of you is such a companion-oriented focus game.

name: Whiskara
description: Whiskara is an action role-playing game where you play as a cat named Lyra. Whiskara also features choice-driven storytelling

name: Vinland Tales
description: Vinland Tales is a Survival Action RPG with casual sandbox game mechanics and big village-building possibilities. You'll experience a new type of survival game with quests, continuous open world progression, frosty surprises in dark winter and opportunities to raid until the Armageddon comes knocking.

name: Arena Breakout: Infinite – Season 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Hypnosis Microphone: Dream Rap Battle
description: A turn-based JRPG based on an alternative Hypnosis Mic universe with its own story centered around virtual reality. Released for iOS and Android in Japan.

name: Gravenfall: Veil of Darkness
description: Gravenfall: Veil of Darkness combines turn-based combat with puzzle-solving in a story-driven adventure. Battle cursed creatures, uncover relics, and unravel the tragic tale of love, betrayal, and dark magic at the core of Gravenfall’s curse.

name: Shirogane Maid Club
description: A whimsical romantic comedy centered around the Maid Club!

name: Spellwheel
description: Combine runes and sling spells with a magic wheel to defeat goblins, knights, and killer robots. Experiment with magical runes, fight quirky enemies, and defy the will of Death itself, all to rescue your beloved.

name: Death By Chatter
description: A 2D platformer rage game developed by Youtuber PinoPrime that is directly affected by your Twitch chat. Try to get to the top as your own chat sabotages you along the way! (Disclaimer: Game may cause rage even for epic gamers like me)

name: TED Tumblewords
description: Slide rows of scrambled letters to spell words in this thought-provoking word puzzle game from TED. Play every day to level up and set new spelling high scores.

name: Homeless Dog Motel
description: As the Homeless Dog slumbers, a nightmare creeps up to take over her night. Explore the depths of the loop her mind has trapped her in. The images that are conjured up are potentially tied to her past, allowing the player to learn more about the protagonist as they go on.

name: Ultra Cop
description: A challenging retro arcade FPS/TPS straight from the late '90s. The Crime Wars have started and it's up to the Ultra Cops to bring back ultimate justice. Use Mechs, Riot Cars and serious firepower to bring the pain to the criminal underworld in this 6th Generation Y2K inspired game.

name: Unplugged
description: Embark on an adventure with a friend in UnPlugged. Work together with a friend in a challenging Local Co-Op as two robots who work their way through challenging puzzles and mazes in an epic adventure.

name: Gabang: Ultimate
description: GABANG: ULTIMATE is a roguelike deck-building game that builds your own deck with various classes and items. Defeat your enemies with a cute backpack and randomly placed items that help you!

name: Five Nights at Jaygi's Classic
description: This is Five Nights at Jaygi's Classic. This game is based on the original concept drawing from 2015 where these characters get their moment to shine for the first time!

name: HeartFinder
description: Hi! Can you find 50 little hidden hearts?

name: Genshin Impact: Tapestry of Spirit and Flame
description:
Version 5.2 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Chasca and Ororon
• New areas: Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan
• New main story quest: Archon Quest, Chapter V - Interlude
• New Tribal Chronicles quests for the Flower-Feather Clan and the Masters of the Night-Wind
• New main event: Itkomi Spiritseeking Scrolls
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Storybook Vale
description:
Be whisked away to the Vale and embark on an enchanting adventure with a cast of new characters including the Lorekeeper – a magical book holding this fantastical land together. However, a happily ever after is a ways off as you discover that discordance between two iconic Disney Villains - Maleficent from Disney’s Sleeping Beauty and Hades from Disney’s Hercules, has torn this land apart.

Causing mysterious phenomenon across The Vale’s three biomes – the Bind, Everafter, and Mythopia – their conflict has yielded Ink seeping out of the very ground and sent the pages of the Lorekeeper near and far as enchanted page pieces called Snippets.

name: Rise of a Legend
description: Rise of a Legend is a third-person action RPG that immerses you in the ruthless era of gladiatorial combat. Engage in rich single-player progression or take on challengers in online multiplayer matches. Manage your Ludus, level up your fighters, and boost your house's prestige with every victory.

name: Zup! Y
description: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Don't Drop The Wall, Jack!
description: In this construction game, you’ll play as Jack, a proud contractor. Using his crane, Jack will build various structures, including houses, hotels, and bridges. Skillful crane operation is crucial for progress and achieving new objectives. But above all, be extra careful with your walls!

name: Jellies of the Deep
description: Explore a dreamy, hand-drawn world where little deep-sea jellies roam. Jellies of the Deep is a relaxing, hidden object and spot-the-difference game in one.

name: 6-Sided Stories
description: A short and cozy puzzler with chill lofi beats: flip the puzzle pieces and colour them correctly to reveal the full picture! Discover how each image leads into the next, following a crew of adorable animals as they make friends and have wholesome adventures.

name: Graces: Posthumous Wish
description: Aki is haunted by a curse. In search of salvation, she travels into the memories of a dead classmate, where she must witness three eerie mystical stories and figure out how to break the shackles of misfortune.

name: Stig
description: A sokoban-style puzzle game about finding a path through colors

name: Pogo Rogue
description: Bounce to the top in this skill based, roguelite action-platformer! Collect powerful items, pick unique weapons, and fight off a variety of enemies while navigating around with a fun, difficult, and unique movement system. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Tarot Realms
description: Select three cards from a shuffled deck to get a spread for Past, Present, and Future. See how the chosen cards correspond to the Tree of Life sefirot. Provide your feedback as we work on interactive Tarot characters and locations together. Join us in making a meditative immersive Tarot experience.

name: Luma Island
description: Travel to Luma Island to go on an epic adventure by yourself or with your friends and family. Build your dream farm, master professions, collect magical Lumas, find treasures and unravel the mysteries of the island.

name: Sprite's Honor!
description: A stranded troop of fairy scouts gather and farm as they try to find their way home!

name: Forge Front
description: Defend magical orbs from goblin invaders in 'Forge Front.' Build and upgrade structures strategically across diverse landscapes in this FPS tower defense adventure!

name: Tiny Tales: Hidden Objects
description: Explore charming scenarios, find 3, 5, or 7 hidden objects in 20 stunning levels. Become a master in the search for carefully concealed secrets.

name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector' s Edition includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of the game
- Steel Book (Collector`s art)
- Letter From Developers
- Souvenir Zone Permit
- Sticker Pack
- Zone Map
- Poster
- Faction Patches
- Military Token
- Keychain (Multi-tool) with Fire Starter
- Art Book
- Stalker Figurine

(Pre-order Bonuses)
- Extended campfire content
- Exclusive weapon skin
- Exclusive armor skin
- 'Early bird' multiplayer badge

name: Stratum Descent
description: Stratum Descent: a thrilling rogue-lite card game where you forge customizable cards, navigate through dangerous stratums, and confront powerful stratum lords. Upgrade your character, collect relics, and delve deeper into an ever-challenging journey. How far will you descend?

name: Rogue Knight
description: Experience fast-paced rogue-lite gameplay. Explore ever-changing locations and fight vicious enemies in souls-inspired 2d combat. Every run you will find variety of items and spells to compliment your playstyle, as well as resources to upgrade your town for future runs.

name: Open Hunting XL
description: Open Hunting XL is a hunting simulator focused on creating a customizable experience. Hunt small game with engaging systems tailored to those animals. Go after deer with challenging realistic gameplay or go for a casual day out hunting after tweaking your experience to what you enjoy.

name: Rainette
description: Rainette is an indie 3D platformer. Explore levels, get cosmetics, and get the best times!

name: Top Gnome
description: A top down shooter where the only way to move and fight is with the recoil of your blunderbuss. Whirl through waves of garden-destroying pests to defend Bert's garden, strive to reach higher and higher scores and become the Top Gnome!

name: Supervive
description: Jump, glide, shoot, punch, bounce, nuke, spike your enemies in this free-flowing, chaotic battleground in the sky. Face off in all-out, multi-squad teamfights, take down boss monsters for big loot, get that W and run it back.

name: Silent Shores
description: Silent Shores is a first-person open world horror game where you play as a father searching for his missing son on an abandoned island.

name: Life Saver
description: Earth is on the verge of World War 3. All life as we know it will be gone tomorrow. Take control of "Super Star Dan" to build a super SSD that can store every DNA on earth before the world goes up in flames. "Life Saver" is a twin stick shooter that you don't want to miss out on!

name: Xheres
description: Either FPS or TPS, choose your play style and survive the apocalypse on your own or with your friends. But one must know for sure it ain't gonna be easy, there are hordes waiting for you. Not even considering tough ones... Nevertheless it's gonna be a fun experience.

name: Ratopia
description: New game with combined genre of strategic survival, Sandbox, and city building simulation. Enjoy the simulation with vast world to adventure with a great number of contents. Build your own economical system to sustain your ideal city of Ratopia.

name: Village Heros
description: Village Heros is a fast-paced roguelike cooperative bullet-hell mmorpg. Fight with friends to defend the village from Shadowlords! Defeat enemies, level up, get better equipments, then permanent death to obtain hero modifiers.

name: World of Football
description: World of Football offers an authentic team-based football physics experience. Dive into straightforward gameplay that's challenging to master, ensuring a competitive edge. Experience true control with intuitive mechanics, devoid of randomness or luck!

name: Demiurges
description: Demiurges is a strategic roguelike game. Build your deck, develop your city, upgrade your heroes, and defeat your enemies in turn-based battles to save your world from destruction. Immerse yourself in a rich fantasy world. Collect new cards to create new strategies and increase your chances.

name: Summa Expeditionis
description: Summa Expeditionis is a survival and strategy game set in ancient Roman Empire. Follow the career of a Roman soldier from Legionnaire to Centurion. Build and manage your camp, recruit more soldiers and face the barbarians for the glory of Rome.

name: Asterogues
description: Beat up planets in Asterogues, a cosmic bullet hell shoot-em-up hybrid! Pick your character from a band of outcasts banished to the Asteroid Belt, dodge and shoot your way through a brutal onslaught of bullets, and take revenge against the Solar System!

name: Zardy's Cave
description: Beneath the farm something terrible awaits. You fell down a giant hole into a dark world full of terrifying scarecrows and monsters. Now you must make your way through the tunnels deep underground while watching your back. Solve puzzles, find tools, and most importantly… Stay alive!

name: Dungeon Team
description: Dungeon Team is a turn-based tactics team builder with 2 main game modes: PvP arena, and an idle dungeon crawl for leveling up your squads. 57 unique abilities from 8 mix-&-match ability trees (Bow Use, Alchemy, Conjuration, etc.), procedural equipment system, AI controls, and much much more!

name: Elemental Roll
description: Betrayed by his own servants, Byle - The former King of Hell - was exiled from his kingdom to the Human World. Now Byle rolls through a world much larger than him looking for a way back home. Attempt to always go faster and reach new heights to get Byle's strength back !

name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Deluxe Edition
description:
Deluxe Edition contains:
- Additional side quest
- Costume & Weapon skins
- Digital Artbook & Soundtrack Pre-Order Deluxe Edition now now and get:
- Extended campfire content
- 'Early Bird' Weapon & Costume Skin
- 'Early Bird' multiplayer badge

name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Ultimate Edition
description:
S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl Ultimate Edition Contains:

P.H.Y.S.I.C.A.L.
- Steel Book (Ultimate art)
- Letter From Developers
- Souvenir Zone Permit
- Sticker Pack
- Zone Map
- Poster
- Faction Patches
- Military Token
- Keychain (Multi-tool) with Fire Starter
- Art Book
- Stalker Figurine
- Artefact Container Lamp

(Pre-Order Bonus):

- Exclusive armor skin

(Steam Exclusive Content)

- Animated Avatar
- Avatar Frame

(Pre-order Bonus)
- Extended campfire content
- Exclusive weapon skin
- Exclusive armor skin
- 'Early bird' multiplayer badge

name: IT Startup: Tech Fodder
description: A dev themed Roguelike Deckbuilder. Play Developer Cards to gain project points. Raise your DEV’s efficiency with Knowledge Cards. Sabotage your opponents or steal their Developers. Craft a unique deck and squeeze out your employees to win the next Project Battle!

name: Maggie's Movies: Second Shot
description: Become a movie director and help Maggie survive her second shot at fame, as she directs her first feature-length pirate movie!

name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
description: S.T.A.L.K.E.R 2 is a unique blend of FPS, immersive sim and horror with a really thick atmosphere. One of the biggest open-worlds to date is yours to explore — along with an epic branching story with multiple endings. S.T.A.L.K.E.R. stands for (Scavengers, Trespassers, Adventurers, Loners, Killers, Explorers and Robbers).

name: War Thunder: Su-22M4 WTD 61 Bundle
War Thunder: Object 140 Bundle
Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024: Premium Deluxe Edition
description: Pursue your aviation career throughout the world with dynamically-generated missions ranging from Medevac and Search & Rescue to Aerial Firefighting and Passenger Transport. Compete against other pilots in the iconic Reno and Red Bull Air Races. Enhanced physics and aircraft systems and a groundbreaking flight planner create an unparalleled simulation experience. Explore the most detailed digital twin of the world to date with real-time air and ship traffic and a vast array of animals. Set out on your global adventure with our largest fleet of aircraft as Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 takes simulation to new heights of authenticity and realism.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024: Deluxe Edition
description: Pursue your aviation career throughout the world with dynamically-generated missions ranging from Medevac and Search & Rescue to Aerial Firefighting and Passenger Transport. Compete against other pilots in the iconic Reno and Red Bull Air Races. Enhanced physics and aircraft systems and a groundbreaking flight planner create an unparalleled simulation experience. Explore the most detailed digital twin of the world to date with real-time air and ship traffic and a vast array of animals. Set out on your global adventure with our largest fleet of aircraft as Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 takes simulation to new heights of authenticity and realism.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024: Aviator Edition
description: Pursue your aviation career throughout the world with dynamically-generated missions ranging from Medevac and Search & Rescue to Aerial Firefighting and Passenger Transport. Compete against other pilots in the iconic Reno and Red Bull Air Races. Enhanced physics and aircraft systems and a groundbreaking flight planner create an unparalleled simulation experience. Explore the most detailed digital twin of the world to date with real-time air and ship traffic and a vast array of animals. Set out on your global adventure with our largest fleet of aircraft as Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 takes simulation to new heights of authenticity and realism.

name: Louise Kills The Belchers!
description:
An afternoon nap interrupted by orders...to kill!
It's a bloody day on Ocean Avenue as Louise takes down the Belcher family. Her favorite toy Kuchi Kopi speaks to her and demands sacrifice. Armed with items found around the house and a dangerous mind, she's serving up murder and its a taste that can't be beat!

name: SneakBit
description: Awaken in a mysterious world teeming with danger, magic, and secrets. Collect keys, brave perilous dungeons, and confront the legendary Demon Lord—but beware, the prophecy holds surprises.

name: Van Simulator
description: Van Simulator is a delivery game where you drive a van, pick up packages, and deliver them. Expand your business, upgrade your van, and manage deliveries efficiently. Enjoy urban delivery in a low-poly environment.

name: A Bone To Pick
description: Ribsy is a skeleton, brought to life by the capricious Skeleton God. The Skeleton God is bored, and so he's set Ribsy a task- figure out who killed the pirate Captain who once owned Ribsy's bones.

name: Goldenheart
description: Goldenheart is a retro first person fantasy adventure game created by two people in our home studio. It has a look and feel inspired by our favorite classic console games.

name: Evil Nun: The Broken Mask - Unholy Edition
description:
Includes Special Slip Cover, Digital Soundtrack, Camp Admission Letter, Art book and PS5 Game.
Enter Evil Nun's nightmare: trapped in a cursed school, escape from Sister Madeline.

She is cunning, searching every corner, luring you in and talking to you according to your actions.

Solve puzzles, craft items, and uncover the mystery in this horror game with different escape routes.

Based on the hit mobile game series with over 60M downloads, Evil Nun: The Broken Mask recaptures the essence of the original with improved graphics, new maps and a new storyline.

A combination of survival horror and hide-and-seek set in an immersive atmosphere.

name: Anno: Mutationem - Complete Edition
description:
Anno: Mutationem is an action-adventure game with RPG elements set in a cyberpunk world, featuring a unique mix of pixelated 2D & 3D graphic style with a rich, dark and bizarre plot.

Welcome to the neon-covered, 2D-meets-3D Cyberpunk world of ANNO: Mutationem. In this Action-Adventure game with RPG elements you become Ann: a highly-skilled combat-trained lone wolf on a personal mission in the giant Metropolis, full of sinister mega-corporations, mysterious fringe groups and creatures more bizarre than words can express.

name: Spase Defense
description: Stranded on a far flung planet, hold out for rescue against alien foes with a variety of guns, lasers, and explosives.

name: Blood Omen 2: Legacy of Kain
description: This is an emulation of the classic PS2 action-adventure title, Blood Omen 2: Legacy of Kain. Chronologically, this takes place in an alternate timeline, between the events of Blood Omen and Soul Reaver, and lets players experience Kain's epic adventure on PS4 and PS5 for the first time.

name: Ant: Protect The Queen
description: Face endless hordes of fierce and powerful invaders. Fight, gain experience, evolve and become stronger to protect the queen.

name: Cliff Rush 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Forbidden Fantasy
description: Forbidden Fantasy is a choice-driven adult visual novel where you're the chosen one. Become the hero of prophecy, romance elven women, and save the world from the Demon Queen. Your quest will be filled with adventure, drama, and lots of sex.

name: Sklime: A Difficult Climbing Adventure
description: Sklime is a difficult single level twin-stick climbing game taking inspiration from Bennett Foddy's Getting Over It. The player must climb over a thousand meters out of The Depths, visiting 7 different colorful zones while playing some minigames along the way.

name: Papa's Pizzeria Deluxe
description: Top, bake, and serve delicious pizzas in Papa's Pizzeria Deluxe! Craft pizzas for Papa Louie's loyal customers while earning tips, points, and Special Recipes. Unlock holiday ingredients for seasonal pies, and take a trip in the Food Truck to serve your own unique creations!

name: Flat Fat Fartfest
description: Our friend Chuggy just devoured a hearty plate of extra spicy noodles and is on the brink of an epic bout of diarrhea. The nearest toilet is several kilometers up… several. I wish you good luck on your journey, but be warned—the diapers were left at home.

name: Magnitude
description: Sin descripción

name: Multimind
description: Multimind is a relaxing game that tests the player's ability to multitask. Players need to maintain the stability of multiple game items at the same time and try to persist as long as possible as the game difficulty increases.

name: Sleeping: Counting Sheep
description: A relaxing, Twitch-integrated sheep simulation where viewers can spawn and chat as sheep. Perfect for streamers looking to entertain their audience while resting or away from their keyboard.

name: Touhou Spell Carnival: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Destiny 2: Revenant - Act 2
description: Guardians will raid the Tomb of Elders to rescue Eliksni prisoners and stop Fikrul’s plan to add powerful enemies of the past to his Revenant army.

name: Santa's Spot It + Exit Station 7 + Find Room 96 + HighScore Anomaly Shop +HighScore Anomaly Underground
description: Dive into the thrilling world of anomalies.

name: Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain
description:
This is an emulation of the classic PS1 action-adventure title, Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain.

A dark, gothic fantasy, Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain takes gamers on an epic quest through a Vampire kingdom fraught with murder, magic and vengeance.

Accentuated with cinema-quality voice-overs, dynamic lighting effects and more than 25 minutes of revolutionary full-motion-video footage, Legacy of Kain features an engrossing storyline that invites gamers to embark on a journey through an expansive world containing more than 100 hours of intense, blood-sucking, spell-casting gameplay.

name: Stellar Blade x Nier: Automata
description:
In this DLC, the character “Emil’s Shop” from the action RPG NieR:Automata, produced by Square Enix and directed by Yoko Taro, appears with his item shop in the world of Stellar Blade.

“Emil’s Shop” is a mobile item shop that freely moves around the Wastelands and the Great Desert open areas.

name: MySims: Cozy Bundle
description: Two adorable adventures!

name: MySims: Cozy Bundle
description:
Make adorable friends and discover creative adventures across retro re-releases of two lovable games in MySims: Cozy Bundle. Use your imagination to rebuild a town in MySims and help a cute magical land become an even better place in MySims Kingdom.

There are stories to uncover, locations to explore, and lots of characters with big personalities to meet.

name: Fiesta Animal
description: Fiesta Animal is a party multiplayer game 5v5 online. Play with friends and your family! cooperation and friendship are your best tools to victory. Run, jump, swimming and laugh as much as you want!

name: I Am Dog
description: I Am Dog is a 2D vertical scrolling platformer where you play as Dog! Chomp, stomp and bomb your way through dirt, stone and enemies and reach the bottom of the depths to rescue Dog's friends!

name: Magibrick
description: "Magibrick" is a uniquely styled deck-building game. Assemble a deck with the right Magibrick and challenge diverse enemies in different regions. Fill the board, destroy enemy bricks,play amazing combo, and occupy the entire board with your Magibricks, leaving no space for your enemy.

name: Threshold
description: Threshold is a short, dark and atmospheric First Person Exploration game picturing disturbing facts about an untold brutal story. Pick your country, start your shift and try to save the world with the help of your precious bucket, some Air Cans and a bunch of planks.

name: Sklime
description: Embark on a gripping ascent in Sklime, where your tenacity is tested at every ledge in the treacherous Depths. With two resilient arms, hoist yourself from the shadows to the promised light above. How high can you climb before the Depths reclaim you?

name: Node Farm
description: Node Farm is a game about building a fully automated farm using nodes. Connect nodes, harvest and sell veggies, buy new islands, discover new nodes, and automate the process - all in a cozy farm simulation formula!

name: Quest of Goddess
description: Sin descripción

name: Starpuffs
description: Your Starpuffs are in trouble! You need to rescue them! Split and merge your way through over 100 increasingly challenging and complex levels in this cute and colourful puzzle game. Can you save all the Starpuffs?

name: The Seven Realms: Realm 3 - High Lathión
description: The Seven Realms is a fantasy, story-driven, adult visual novel where your choices will shape the fate of the Realms and the people around you. Will you be a Fair or a Strong Ruler? Will fate be enough for you, or will you want more? The choices are yours to make.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024
description: Pursue your dream of an aviation career with Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024. This brand-new simulator is designed to take advantage of the latest technologies in simulation, cloud, machine learning, graphics and gaming to create the most sophisticated, immersive and awe-inspiring flight simulator of all time. To achieve this unprecedented level of accuracy, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 is powered by the significantly evolved Asobo Studio engine.

name: Towers of Aghasba
description: Towers of Aghasba, an open-world experience where players can build vast settlements and grow sprawling ecosystems on their fantasy island.

name: Ancient Mind
description: Explore a region of mystery and danger in Ancient Mind, a modern take on the classic zelda-like top-down action adventure. Explore dungeons, fight monsters, solve puzzles, and discover the truth about ancient legends.

name: Toads of the Bayou
description: Lead a group of toads as they fight against Baron Samedi’s evil forces in a challenging mix of turn-based tactics and roguelike deckbuilding. Synergise card effects, build a settlement and engage in strategic combat to thrive in the cursed bayou.

name: Pacific Drive: Frosted Customization Pack
description: Decorations, a little hot cocoa, and cozy friends are all you need to hibernate for the season. Prepare for the cold and decorate your station wagon with winter themed cosmetics!

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Game of the Year Edition
description: Enjoy the ultimate adventure in the Best RPG of 2021 with all six premium expansions. Lead a band of unique companions, forge alliances, and rise as a Mythic Hero to decide the fate of mortals and gods alike.

name: DayZ: Cool Edition
description: The DayZ Cool Edition bundle features DayZ with the Livonia map, as well DayZ Frostline. Explore the dense and deadly Livonia. Brave the wintry terrain in the volcanic archipelago of Sakhal. Battle the infected and survivors who are hungrier and more desperate than you.

name: Echoes of Formosa: Agent Reborn
description: Embark on a journey through Taiwan’s rich history in 'Echoes of Formosa: Agent Reborn.' Play as Li Bin, a secret agent awakening in the prison of Stad Zeelandia, on the brink of war. Unravel mysteries, explore ancient streets, and reclaim lost memories in this immersive adventure.

name: Kuukiyomi 4: Consider It
description: One 4 All, All 4 One, This is a game that checks your ability to be considerate to make the world a little more peaceful.

name: Arcane Beak
description: This game was made for VimJam #5 by Róger Goulart. The Jam's focus was RACING and the theme was ESCAPE, with the following optional challenges: 4 color palette, only animal characters and mouse only. I couldn't do everything I wanted, but the game was fun and challenging.

name: Let Me Book
description: Let Me Book is an intense, first-person survival game where your goal is to return the books to their bookshelves and not DIE in the process. You're a late night shift worker at a haunted library. Danger lurks around every bookshelf! Return the books and escape the library!

name: Survival Tobita vs. Maniac-Man: Halloween Deathmatch Special!!!
description: Survival Tobita vs Maniac-Man: Halloween Deathmatch SPECIAL!!! is a simple dungeon crawler JRPG, where you play as Tobita himself! Explore Maniac-Man's deadly factory, fight psycho-wrestlers and try to survive.

name: Finity
description: Fuse monsters, build strategic decks, catch wild beasts, and battle players worldwide in the ultimate monster MMO!

name: Star Sentry
description: A tower defense game where player defend their star against enemies that intelligently circle around obstacles.

name: Frontline Inferno
description: Step into the boots of a soldier from the Axis, Soviet, or Allied forces and engage in thrilling, rapid-fire battles across colorful, stylized battlegrounds. Frontline Inferno is an action-packed FPS arena shooter that combines the historical setting of World War II with an arcade twist, delivering frantic gunfights, instant respawns, and total freedom in how you gear up.

name: Mister Antonio
description: A puzzle adventure game about a quirky cat with rather curious demands.

name: The Binding of Isaac: Repentance+
description: The Binding of Isaac Repentance+ is an update to The Binding of Isaac Repentance, adding in online multiplayer co-op and reworking otherwise poorly regarded items.

name: Squash Ball
description: Welcome to Squash Ball, the ultimate idle clicker sandbox game with physics, themes, clicking stats, and a leveling system. Perfect for casual gamers and those who love to fidget with items digitally. With its colorful design and addicting gameplay, it's easy to pick up and hard to put down.

name: Stealth Syndicate
description: Stay hidden among the crowd and defeat your opponents before getting spotted, or you risk not surviving in this party game where you need to mix stealth, speed, and tactics. Playable locally and online for 2 to 10 players.

name: Bub-O Burst
description: Bub-O Burst your way through addictive, score-chasing fun, with fierce bubble action, in this throwback to classic 2D action arcade games! It's easy to learn, but do you have the skills to master it?

name: Pro Basketball Manager 2025
description: Pro Basketball Manager 2025 is the ultimate basketball manager experience. Suit up and become the manager of a basketball team. You’ll have all the managerial tools you’ve come to expect in a manager game, scouting, facilities, training and more. Will you put emphasis on coaching or player development? Success is only the result of your decisions both on and off the court.

name: A Beaver's Tale
description: A cozy, adventure, builder game. Live out the life of Buckey the Beaver: go swimming in the river, build dams, and find treasures! In story mode, learn to protect your beaver kits and become a master builder. Fully customize this colorful and cozy world in builder mode.

name: Kingdoms of Age
description: Kingdoms of Age is an online trading card game, which pits you against other players online to battle in the arena.

name: Brawlers of Duality
description: Brawlers of Duality is an arena fighter where damaging enemies launches them harder. Launch enemies into obstacles to defeat them using martial arts, magic and technology. Battle in 1v1, 2v2, and a mode where you collect loot to power up and fight in a free for all.

name: Deathpuddle: Choose Violence?
description: Enter the chaotic, not-so-superhero world of Deathpuddle: Choose Violence? Guide Deathpuddle through epic and absurd missions filled with dark humor, bizarre characters, and unpredictable outcomes. Can you help Deathpuddle survive and clear his name, or will he always end up back in jail?

name: World Crafter TD
description:
A highly addictive survival crafting tower defense game!
Gather, craft, build turrets, shoot guns, and expand the land to defend against waves of enemies in World Crafter TD!

name: Don't Be a Hero
description: This is a story about overcoming challenges and becoming a hero. A total of four trials await you, and you must defeat several powerful enemies in order to pass. Every battle is difficult, you must read the enemy's moves, choose the right aid, and adopt the right strategy to win.

name: Maid Cafe on Electric Street
description: Maid Cafe on Electric Street is a leisurely maid cafe adventure set in the otaku haven of Nipponbashi, Osaka.

name: Lone Hero Path
description: The idle game is mainly about improving skills and equipment. You will meet pets and people with the same path, communicate with them, discover various strange equipment and items, and collect various skills.

name: Call Center Tycoon
description: Call Center Tycoon is a business management simulation game where the goal is to get the best out of your employees. Keep your employees stress level's low and they will perform better increasing your profits and your market share. Make key decisions and watch the action unfold.

name: Fight Back The Night
description: A fantasy action-adventure game in which you must use a variety of fire-based powers to defeat an army of monsters infesting your realm. Upgrade your abilities, unlock new ones, and fight more and more enemies in this bullet-hell like game.

name: Iconia Defenders
description: Build mazes, customize your deck and travel through time, in a nostalgic tower defense game with a minimalist feel and a rogue-lite twist. Only you can save the Tree of Life from the malevolent forces of The Corruption...

name: Bedroom Battlegrounds
description: Did you ever embark on epic battles with toy soldiers in your childhood? Bedroom Battlegrounds brings that nostalgic thrill to life, allowing you to strategize and conquer in the imaginative settings of a child's bedroom. Experience the joy of childhood warfare again – play the game now!

name: Cloudy Valley
description: Join the summer camp at Cloudy Valley! Dive into exploring the archipelago to find the camp's pins or relax peacefully by the seaside with a cozy and soothing atmosphere

name: Heroes & Redemption
description: Heroes & Redemption is a rogue-lite bullet-hell where you face hordes of enemies, annihilate them, learn new abilities and enhance your skills. Explore different regions, acquire new companions and embark on adventures again and again.

name: Seer's Gambit
description: Seer's Gambit is a strategic, semi-auto battler that rewards smart positioning, player agency and building a team that plays to each character’s strength. Explore a perilous world to unlock new heroes for the perfect team composition or upgrade nodes for powerful group buffs.

name: Skygard Arena
description: Skygard Arena is a turn-based tactical RPG with a vibrant roster of MOBA-style Heroes. Assemble your squad, equip items and abilities, and outplay your opponents in fast-paced strategic battles. Discover the world of Skygard in a multi-campaign solo adventure, or fight in thrilling PvP matches!

name: Once Alive
description: A story-driven, first person adventure game with a cinematic experience. Set off for a journey to HaustVille, an abandoned settlement in a post-apocalyptic world. Explore your surroundings and unveil the mystery of how the last survivors vanished.

name: Miami Horizon 2077
description: GTA cop chase if it was a 2D arcade . Drive your way through the street of miami in 2077 in style.Buy upgrades, cars , collect power-ups and battle your way out like a real-badass.

name: Arcane Wilds
description: Arcane Wilds is a western themed fantasy RTS with a unique twist on resource management. Resources can be harvested or stolen and then transported to the battlefield to enhance combat. Play cooperative missions for 1-4 players or competitively with up to 8 players or AI.

name: Rose
description: Sacrifice your flesh and blood for new weapons and abilities. Slaughter waves of monstrous enemies and titanic bosses in procedurally changing arenas or die trying, upgrade your abilities and return to the fight ever stronger!

name: Hotloop
description: Hotloop is a dynamic mix of old school arcade and simulation. In the game you will meet a realistic system of spacecraft behavior and pricise orbital mechanics. You have to curb the force of gravity of the planets in order to repulse numerous enemies.

name: RAM: Random Access Mayhem
description: RAM: a top-down roguelike shooter with no player character. Seize control of diverse robotic enemies, turn them against each other in frantically paced combat, and fluidly swap to fresh hosts as old ones collapse into smoldering rubble.

name: Forgotten but Unbroken
description: Forgotten but Unbroken is a tactical turn-based strategy game inspired by XCOM but offers its own unique take on the genre. Meet real life WW2 heroes and choose whether to fight with or against them! It’s time to lead the resistance against the Axis forces and help to liberate Europe!

name: Maid Cafe at Electric Street
description: This is a role-playing game about maid cafe, featuring the theme of love, adventure and simulation, set in the otaku haven of Nipponbashi, Osaka. Developed by Adventurer's Tavern, an indie game team from Shanghai, China.

name: Bramblewood
description: Live in a Castle, Work for a Sorceress, Save the Valley! Bramblewood is a cute magical farming sim where you learn spells to care for plants. Befriend the locals and help them save their small businesses to unlock festivals and romance options.

name: Rogue Command
description: Classic RTS gameplay fused with a modern roguelike. Shape your build each run by assembling an evolving arsenal of powerful units and facilities. Harvest resources, build out your base. Raise your army and call down orbital strikes to overcome the forces threatening your survival.

name: Lilith's Lair
description: A story driven sextroidvania click-em-up where you play as a brave barbarian ascending a lascivious lair!

name: World Ultimate Mafia
description: Mafia Browser Game

name: Idle Sphere
description: A supreme idle game played by fantastic spheres. Its overwhelming beauty in your hands.

name: Treasure Atlas
description: This is a roguelike card game with RPG elements. An open world with a procedurally generated map where you decide where to go and who to fight. Along the way, you will encounter events that complicate or simplify the adventure. you will have to create your character and choose a class for him.

name: Vircoban
description: A Sokoban engine / game for the Vircon32 fantasy console

name: Secret Bureau
description:
Secret Bureau is an exhilarating single-player, first-person adventure game available for both PC and Virtual Reality (PCVR Meta) in the same software package.

Players will navigate hostile territories, infiltrate enemy bunkers, disguise themselves, and engage with spies to thwart the nefarious plans of the Betalog Corporation. The game combines intense action with strategic gameplay, encouraging players to overcome a variety of challenges to achieve their mission.

Designed with a cinematic concept reminiscent of blockbuster franchises like “Mission: Impossible” and “007.”

name: Curvelicious
description: A fast-paced, competitive multiplayer curve game where up to 8 players battle in local matches. Customize your gameplay with dozens of power-ups and game modes, from classic no-powerup duels to chaotic arcade challenges. Master your curve and outlast your opponents! Gamepad supported.

name: Last Star
description: Last Star is a space shooter roguelite with tower defense elements. Pilot a spaceship to protect your solar core from endless waves of alien invaders. Upgrade both your core and spaceship to become unstoppable. Execute tactical counterattacks against alien motherships to slow down the invasion.

name: Echoes
description: Fall through a hidden hole and find yourself trapped somewhere, where your voice is your only lifeline. Shout to light the darkness, and listen carefully to unravel the secrets that lurk within. But beware: the further you delve, the more terrors will emerge from the shadows...

name: Medieval Questionnaire
description: Medieval Questionnaire is an educational game that tests your knowledge of medieval times with true or false questions.

name: Incantation
description: "Incantation" is a first-person horror mystery game adapted from a movie of the same name. The game reveals the chilling story behind "Chen Village" from the movie. A mother searching for her missing daughter accidentally stumbles into a village filled with mysterious cults. Beyond the palpable madness and fear in the village, there's a sinister force that drives one to despair. What happens when one crosses the forbidden line of this evil deity?

name: The Baleful Tower
description: The Baleful Tower is an action filled roguelike dungeon crawler, combining hack and slash with twin-stick shooting for high-intensity isometric gameplay. Venture forth to uncover the mysteries of the Tower, but beware the treacherous monsters that lie within.

name: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split Anthology Collection
description: Endless nightmares haunt Lydia as she fights off the undead and dinosaurs in Cypress Ridge!

name: DougDoug's Basement: How I Got a Sea Otter A Promotion!
description:
"Created for the DougDoug Rosa Charity Stream of 2024, DougDoug's Basement: How I Got a Sea Otter A Promotion! regales the epic quest of a Bell Pepper, an otter, Pajama Sam, and Luther on their unexpected quest to defeat the three Peggle Masters" - the officaal website.

A visual novel themed after the streamer/comedian DougDoug and the lore, characters, and videos he creates.

name: Project Search
description: Project Search is a visual novel of Chinese immortality cultivation. Scholar Qian Jiangmin investigates collapsed pagodas in Linhai's old town while searching for his missing brother. With the help of Daoist cultivators, he explores grotto-heavens and uncovers the truth behind his double vision.

name: 0101: Counter Bonus Levels 3
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Counter levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: Mars Survivor: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Duckweed
description: Eat the Duckweed!

name: BodyCam Assault Shooter
description: Sin descripción

name: Bamboo Retro Run
description: Run, jump, and slash your way through endless retro action!

name: Yakuza Shadows of New York
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcane Chaos
description: Welcome to Arcane Chaos, built with Unreal Engine 5, a fantasy adventure that combines top-down 3D shooting and role-playing! Transform into a cute robot hero, defeat unique enemies, unlock a variety of guns and skill combinations, with light skill construction and roguelike elements.

name: Ramp Bike Racing
description: Can you master the ramps and become the ultimate racing champion?

name: Baldi's Basics The Ancient Save
description: This game offers a rich storyline, building on the classic Baldi's Basics experience. Players are drawn into a deeper mystery, facing new challenges and unexpected twists. With added characters, puzzles, and secrets, it expands the universe with a thrilling and engaging plot.

name: Ice World
description: A blizzard brought a long winter lasting decades, Humanity on the brink of extinction. Survivors had to face ferocious beasts, and the survivors struggled to survive in this frozen world. Take your husky puppy to hunt, mine ice and snow to build a base, and survive in the cold apocalypse.

name: Survivor's Dawn
description: Survive in a challenging 2D zombie game! Face hordes of the undead, earn money by defeating them, and buy upgrades to increase your health, ammo, and more. How far can you go?

name: Bioweaver
description: Bioweaver is an RPG game with the main content of treasure hunting and character building. You can use basic programming logic to deeply customize your skill sets, and you can also create organs with different attributes and functions with the special crafting system.

name: Flag Clicker
description: Flag is a clicker Game, in which you click a Flag!

name: Frozen Below: Arctic Expedition
description: "Frozen Below: Arctic Expedition" is a horror exploration game. Explore an Arctic cave, uncover secrets, and escape a lurking presence. With realistic graphics and immersive sound design, can you survive the frozen terror and escape the darkness?

name: Shuffled Sky
description: Use elemental cards to modify the world in the sky and combine them to discover new abilities in this Roguelike RPG adventure with deckbuilding and tactical combat!

name: Raster
description: Raster is a casual puzzle game about space. Here, you can use a variety of spatial abilities to traverse across diverse terrains, all in search of carrots for the bunny.

name: InFlux Redux
description: InFlux Redux is a high-definition remaster of the 2013 puzzler InFlux, built on a brand new engine with improved graphics, physics and game code. Roll through a series of beautiful environments filled with elaborate, mind-bending puzzle structures.

name: Parkour Civilization
description: Progress from a noob to a god by mastering parkour courses, crafting parkour gadgets, and solving parkour puzzles.

name: Mineral Defense
description: Mineral Defense combines tower defense with roguelite elements and procedural generation. Build paths, unlock upgrades, and unleash powerful synergies to conquer evolving challenges in an ever-expanding world.

name: Breast Simulator
description: Breast Simulator is a fast-paced third-person arena survival game, where you face a multitude of unknown rivals, each with unique abilities and tactics. Earn the favor of powerful alien overlords through your combat prowess, gaining access to critical upgrades and enhancements.

name: GameMaker 25th Anniversary
description: Join us in celebrating twenty five years of GameMaker with GameMaker 25th Anniversary! A fun look at the process behind creating the world's greatest 2D Game Engine! Manage your development house, keep your employees happy, and squash bugs as they come up!

name: Land of Mushrooms: Co-Op mode - Play with Friends
description: Sin descripción

name: Land of Mushrooms: Small Mode - Mini Mushroom Mayhem
description: Sin descripción
