description: Sin descripción

name: Land of Mushrooms: Forest of Nightmares - Background
description: Sin descripción

name: Land of Mushrooms: Kawaii Animals - Skin Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Land of Mushrooms: Scary Horror Mushrooms - Skin Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Land of Mushrooms: Sweet Classic Mushrooms - Skin Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Bear Simulator: Ragnarok's Rise Survival
description: Become the bear hero in Bear Simulator: Ragnarok’s Rise – prepare for mythic chaos!

name: Little Strays
description: In the shadows of abandoned warehouses, tiny kittens await a feline hero to rescue them and scavenge for food.

name: Limb Chopper
description: Limb Chopper is a third-person PS1 style survival slasher horror/shooter set in the underbelly of Los Angeles in the 1980s. You are Detective Palmer, a loose cannon who doesn't play by the rules. You're on a mission to hunt down and apprehend a hulking masked killer before he butchers more innocent citizens.

name: Ink.
description: Ink. is a colorful roguelike adventure where every game is a unique journey, different from the previous one.

name: Nether Dungeons
description: Nether Dungeons is an action-packed dungeon crawler. Battle through procedurally generated dungeons, face relentless enemies, and defeat epic bosses. Customize your hero, wield diverse weapons, and survive intense challenges as you descend into ever-changing, dangerous depths.

name: Shanghai Mahjong Solitaire Premium II
description: NEW 1,100+ Levels of Strategic Zen and Global Challenge!

name: Haze Reverb
description: After a sudden invasion by extraterrestrial beings known as "Sin," humanity is on the brink of extinction. As the only one blessed with "Synesthesia," you must lead girls with the power of Gigantification and fight to save the world!

name: Monkey Kong in New York
description: Get ready to explore the Big Apple like never before in Monkey Kong in New York!

name: Learn to Play vol. 8: Penalty Shootout
description: Aim, shoot, score!

name: Jumping Boy
description: Sin descripción

name: Reflector
description: Sin descripción

name: Half-Life 2: 20th Anniversary Update
description: To celebrate the 20th anniversary, Valve has released a massive update to the game itself. Added new features, fixed old bugs, improved some visuals, added more options, and integrated the Steam Workshop into the classic game.

name: Aftercare Sessions
description: Aftercare Sessions is a short episode dedicated to provide very easy maps. It features light combat, very easy exploration and snack-sized pace, with each map taking no more than 2 minutes. Just jump in and unwind a little.

name: Tormented Soul
description: High Stakes PvPvE—blending MOBA, Sandbox, and MMO progression elements. AOE skill based action combat, seasonal gear progression, loadouts, seamless combat-gathering, partial loot PvP—item corruption & cleansing system, and risk-boosted RNG. Ascend 51 ranks—become a Time Slayer.

name: Spaceman Wakes Up In A New World, The Government Has Been Experimenting On People On the Moon and Created Crazy Vine Monsters
description: a Difficult Rogue-Like about a spaceman trapped on the moon where Crazy Vine monsters run rampant.

name: The Glory of America
description: The Glory of America is an action-packed game where you run through New York as Mr. President, armed and ready to fend off zombies. Complete various mini-missions, collect points, and enjoy stunning graphics, intelligent zombie AI, and a beautifully depicted New York City.

name: Bubbelsche Deluxe
description:
In Bubbelsche Deluxe you must navigate a small bubble through a long, complicated maze without colliding on the game blocks. Manage the bubble as fast and wide as possible without bursting.
You have exactly one attempt per game to make it.

name: Time Soul
description: TIME SOUL is a souls-like action-platformer with generative unique worlds, platforms and planets. Defeat time guardians, collect clocks and shards, and stop the time before facing the Time Lord. Randomized bosses, mobs, 300+items, 50+weapons and spells, Conquer the galaxy in 60 minutes!

name: Hockey Super Squad
description: Hockey Super Squad is a thrilling free to play 3v3 multiplayer online hockey game featuring character creation and lite-RPG mechanics. Jump in alone or with friends!

name: Cat Clean Ocean
description: In Cat Cleans Ocean, play as a cat in an astronaut suit on a serene mission to clean a polluted ocean. Explore six unique regions, using tools like the Trash Magnet and Doddy the Drone to collect trash and upgrade your equipment. Relax, strategize, and restore the ocean’s beauty.

name: Ecchi Fever
description: Play and spend time with beautiful girls in the ecchi world.

name: Gregory Horror Show Soul of Roses
description: Soul of Roses is a 2D rogue light action game. Absorb the abilities of your enemies, fight, die, revive, and repeat to advance the story.

name: Mars vs. Robots
description: Defend Mars from the Robots in this innovative roguelike survival miner. Mine Valueable Resources, Build Powerful Machines, and Fight! Will your planet fall to the greedy humans or will your defence be Robust

name: Finnish Cottage Simulator
description: Finnish Cottage Simulator is the ultimate cottage experience. Relax and enjoy the Finnish summer nature, go to the sauna, get drunk, grill food or play games with others!

name: King of Ping Pong: Megamix
description: Table tennis meets arcade fighter in this fast-paced action-packed journey to become the best in the world. Defeat a series quirky characters utilizing quick wit and precise timing to secure victory in increasingly challenging matches!

name: Deep Space Cache
description: Deep Space Cache is a short incremental game about mining asteroids for resources and converting them into valuable bits.

name: Echoes of the House
description: Christopher arrives at his grandmother's countryside home late at night for a seemingly ordinary visit. But soon after reuniting, he begins to notice something isn't right. The familiar setting warps into a place of unease, and the mystery that unravels is far more complex than anyone could expect.

name: Hot And Lovely XXII
description: This is a classic elimination game. A chessboard full of various playful and cute elements will be presented in the game interface. You need to connect at least three identical elements in a straight line to eliminate them by moving the icons on the chessboard.

name: Time Riggers
description: Challenge your spatio-temporal logic and memory in this time-hop puzzle game.

name: Depths of Faveg
description: Fight your way through hordes of monsters, and try to reach the fabled treasure at the bottom of the dungeon of Faveg in this brutal Roguelike RPG. Can you train a party strong enough?

name: Beyond.Frontiers
description: In beyond.frontiers, you take on the role of an intrepid explorer, free to venture through the universe and beyond the known boundaries of three empires to discover new systems, encounter friends and foes, and engage in thrilling battles. With a large, freely moddable universe and several storylines, this game promises an unforgettable adventure where every decision might shape the fate of the galaxy.

name: Stealth The Hedgehog
description: This game is an experimental 3D platformer with weird references and other random stuff.

name: I Commissioned Some Dogs 3
description: I paid more artists to hide dogs and bones in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: I Commissioned Some Butterflies 4
description: I paid artists to hide butterflies and flowers in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Habilis
description: Follow Nathan Walters as he quickly descends into insanity. Discover the ancient secrets held within a futuristic abandoned factory. A bodycam, Lovecraft-style horror experience not for the weak of heart. Hide, and survive if you can.

name: Echoes of Dread
description: Echoes Of Dread is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore the mansion, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets hidden within. Prepare for unexpected encounters with terrifying entities. The game features an intense atmosphere, non-linear storytelling, and unique moments of horror.

name: Lucky Farm
description: On this tranquil island, you will manage your own farm. Grow crops, build facilities, and sell products to earn rent and drive farm growth. Accumulate wealth to purchase permanent land use rights and become the true owner of the farm.
A puzzle platformer about states.

name: Cabin Corpse
description: Cabin Corpse is a story-driven adult horror visual novel. Filled with suspenseful story telling, compelling characters and a dash of mature themes.

name: Safelight
description: Safelight is the debut first-person puzzle horror game from STEALTH Studios. Navigate through a vacant cruise ship stuck at sea, as you uncover the mystery of how entire portions of the ship have vanished.

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Dungeons of Egrigoz
description: A Classicvania (linear Metroidvania) game where you play as Vlad Tepes Dracula, the Voievode (Warlord) of Wallachia. While being a prisoner to the Ottoman Court, Dracula descends into the dungeons of Egrigoz Castle to recruit a great warrior held as prisoner by the Ottoman Turks.

name: Eagles of World War 2
description: A fantasy based arcade shooter set in World War 2 with frantic bullet hell shooter style gameplay and a bullet time slo motion mechanic. Take on the enemy forces solo or with a friend either in local co-op or online with STEAM's remote play together.

name: ABI-DOS
description: ABI-DOS is an open-ended assembly puzzle game. You are asked to design circuits using a fictional programming language to solve problems that require a great deal of creativity and logic.

name: Atomic Arena
description: Atomic Arena is an immersive VR fighting simulator that combines the adrenaline of "Blade and Sorcery" with the addictive progression of "Cookie Clicker."

name: LingTian1
description: LingTian1 is a 3D visual style otome game. The Prince is madly in love with you. 500+ shots of exquisite dynamic images, 200+ scenes , main line and 9 side lines, Sections for interacting with the prince. Fully Voiced.

name: The Witch
description: The Witch is a first-person indie game in the genre of adventure with elements of horror. In it you are a journalist who has to solve the mystery of the disappearance of the inhabitants of the village of Hoer Verde.

name: Kill Me If You Can
description: "Kill Me If You Can" combines roguelike, RPG, and construction for a survival defense against zombies. Explore by day for growth, and at night, build defenses against incoming zombies. With unique skills per character, control a team, not just one, for dynamic gameplay.

name: Housemates
description: Housemates is a daily life simulation game. A lust virus has hit the country! Play as a college student stuck inside with his landlady and housemate. Talk to them, get to know them, and importantly, 'help them out' with the lust virus!

name: Lumina Rush
description: Lumina Rush is a single-player speed running platformer. Master speed by utilizing sliding, propulsion, swinging, and teleportation to dominating levels at the speed of light.

name: Saturn
description: Saturn is a tactical RPG set on the moons of Saturn and on Earth. The protagonist controls robots on the moons of Saturn and explores an underground city where one can find keys to the secrets of deep space.

name: Industry Giant 4.0
description: Build an industrial empire from scratch in Industry Giant 4.0. Produce goods, build up your industries, construct transportation networks, plan production, manage finances, and navigate global events. Become the next business mogul and write history!

name: Tricky Madness
description: Tricky Madness is an upcoming arcade snowboarding game with a focus on speed and big air inspired by classics like SSX and 1080. Race down the mountain, explore secret areas, catch big air and perform Uber tricks.

name: Infestation: Origins
description: A co-op horror in which you're an exterminator treating sinister infestations caused by twisted versions of classic characters and urban legends.

name: D.A.M. Champion
description: Assemble a team of monsters to use during turn-based battles in this Non-Linear RPG. The world of D.A.M. Champion takes an original approach to the concept of being a protagonist in a monster-taming game.

name: Struggle F.O
description: What the newly awakened girl saw was an unfamiliar world and unfamiliar creatures. And on her arm, there was a mysterious gadget that could speak. Somehow, the girl who could now communicate with all living creatures, starts to struggle with her allies to survive in this world!

name: Dog And Goblin
description: A fantasy deck-building strategy game. Your items and minions have transformed into card symbols. They interact with each others and automaticly fight to beat human army. Choose your cards, build a strong army and destroy human's fort!

name: Inspector Waffles Early Days
description: A top-down detective adventure with point-and-click mechanics, inspired by classic Game Boy games. Follow Waffles in his first days as an inspector who wants to prove to everyone that he is more than just a rookie. But beware… Your future worst enemy is hiding in the shadows.

name: Grooove
description: Grooove is a fun asyncronous music game, where two players help eachother to get out of a haunted mansion with the power of music!

name: Move The Chains: Season 1
description: Move The Chains is a choice-driven adult visual novel that puts you into the shoes of a hot-button athlete who finds himself being given a second chance after spending a year behind bars. The road to redemption is a long one, but it's packed with girls, love, drama, and of course, sex.

name: Lovanium: The Rising Suns
description: Find a way to escape Lovanium before it's too late. Extract resources, trade them, confront the wildest and most dangerous enemies, and fully harness the power of the suns. Are you up for it?

name: Crib
description: It's time to face! As Milton, your past invites you to solve the mysteries. What you learn about yourself will surprise you. Most importantly remember that this is not a nightmare, this is a reality.

name: Wanderer: Broken Bed
description: Wanderer: Broken Bed is a hentai adventure game with dating-sim, point-and-click and RPG elements that will take you to a world of pleasures and lewd adventures.

name: Bread or Dead
description: Playing as a peanut butter and jelly-obsessed professional exterminator, you travel across the world taking care of nasty undead infestations. Make some serious cash to reach your goal of eating as many peanut butter and jelly sandwiches as possible, and down it all with a glass of chocolate milk.

name: Great God Grove
description:
Way up high on a mountaintop sits the Grove, a realm peacefully inhabited by charismatic deities and their devoted human worshippers. That was, until the pantheon's King began spreading insults and disinformation.

Now the gods and their followers have devolved into bickering and fighting! In Great God Grove, players assume the role of Godpoke, the mail carrier for this fractured pantheon. Creatively deliver messages and set the story straight... before the apocalypse consumes us all!

name: RFA Station
description: A space shooter in which you must defeat alien robots.

name: BloodDome99
description: 80s/90s arcade cabinet meets modern horde-survival roguelike. Create unique builds, master 20+ weapons, and kill ever-growing hordes of contestants in the retro-futuristic gladiator gameshow BloodDome99.

name: Gravity Castle
description: Gravity Castle is a puzzle-action platformer game. You become a pilgrim and embark on a journey that will never return, deep into the depths of Gravity Castle. You'll have to face the malevolence of the dungeon, with a mystical tool that allows you to handle the gravity.

name: Mistwinter Bay
description: Rule a town in this story heavy, visual novel-like fantasy RPG! Interact with townsfolk and foreign leaders, build and expand, and tackle randomized events that affect the town and its people.

name: Kawaii Asian Girls
description: Kawaii Asian Girls - It's a relaxing anime puzzles game with cute kawaii asian girls. Solve puzzles, and collect full images. Enjoy high quality artworks.

name: Little Wu Chang
description: "Little Wuchang" is a soul-like APRG game. You'll play as Wuchang, the netherworld's envoy, and start on adventures in a world based on Chinese mythology. You must defeat enemies of various types on multiple different maps. You gonna love and enjoy every time you died.

name: PunchBots
description: PunchBots an fighting game with a different twist multiplayer up to 4 players. Learn when to jump and when to attack dominate your opponents with your strategy and agility in this robot fighting game.

name: My Hotel
description: Restore a forgotten mansion, turn it into your own hotel and increase your reputation. From mopping the floor to hosting the most prestigious personalities. Do your best to beat the challenges, hire employees and earn more stars!

name: Lake of Creatures
description: A fast-paced action FISHING ROGUELIKE, where you're on a quest to save the lakes from mutated creatures! Catch Fish - Find Treasures - Conquer enemy riddled randomly generated lakes!

name: Mac Biskwi Adventures
description: Play as Mac Biskwi in this cute little 2D platformer and help him to bring peace to his kingdom! Be prepared for a really fun game to play, cool effects, amazing musics and awesome levels!

name: Subverse
description: StudioFOW blasts onto Steam with "Subverse" - a sexy new Sci-Fi parody where you command your own starship filled with the hottest babes in the universe! Explore a vast galaxy filled with wacky scumbags and ancient mysteries before unwinding in your quarters with your favorite alien waifus.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Lead the Way
description: Get this add-on to receive a random American Commander, Premium Account days, and a set of various Boosters.

Step into the future with the Polygon Guy Banger! Features 150% More!
Includes:
- Polygon Guy Special Stumbler

- 25000 Gems

description: Adventure To Worlds Beyond!

name: NBA 2K25 x WWE 2K24 x TopSpin 2K25 Bundle
description: Experience the legends and rising stars in three of the sports world's greatest video games. This collection includes NBA 2K25 Cross-Gen Digital Edition, WWE 2K24 Cross-Gen Digital Edition and TopSpin 2K25 Cross-Gen Digital Edition.

name: NBA 2K25 x WWE 2K24 Bundle
description: Command court and ring alike in this sports entertainment bundle that brings all the ankle breaking, top-rope diving fun of the NBA and WWE to your controller. This bundle includes NBA 2K25 Cross-Gen Digital Edition and WWE 2K24 Cross-Gen Digital Edition.

name: NBA 2K25 x TopSpin 2K25 Bundle
description: Command rim and net alike in this sports entertainment bundle that brings all the ankle breaking, ball smashing fun of the NBA and TopSpin to your controller. This bundle includes NBA 2K25 Cross-Gen Digital Edition and TopSpin 2K25 Cross-Gen Digital Edition.

name: Stumble Guys: Burger Banger
description:
Get your game on with Burger Baxter. Features 150% more!
Includes:
- Burger Baxter Special Skin
- Fire Punch Special Emote
- 12500 Gems

name: The Sims 4: Sweet Slumber Party Kit
description: Look cute even when the venue of your party is your own bedroom with The Sims 4 Sweet Slumber Party Kit. The pastel colors, fluffy fabrics, adorable designs, and patterns will make you feel like you’re in a dream. Complete your sleepwear attire with cute nail designs, fuzzy socks and slippers, and fun skincare items. Created by Trillyke.

name: The Sims 4: Cozy Kitsch Kit
description: Embrace vibrant colors and mid-century modern design with The Sims 4 Cozy Kitsch Kit. Inspired by the 60s and the 70s, this collection of living room items features bold color and pattern combinations, stylish surfaces, and cute décor with delightful character. Add subtle accents to your room, or make a statement with every piece. Created by myshunosun.

name: Snake.io
description: Sin descripción

name: Carpathian Night Starring Bela Lugosi
description: Sin descripción

name: Replikant Chat
description: A fun and immersive experience for all, where you can interact in real-time with 3D characters like never before.

name: Waifu Simulator: Furry Edition
description: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: In The Foundations
description: A horror visual novel about coming home to your childhood home.

name: 0101: Pusher Bonus Levels 3
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Pusher levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Don't Bring Civilians Into This: Special Appearance by The Captain from EDF6
description: Adds the character "The Captain."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Extra Mission Pack: Robo Saurous vs. The Mecharmy
description: A collection of additional missions featuring many new enemies that did not appear in the main game. Included in this collection is another story that took place in the time line corresponding to missions 79 to 83 of the main game.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Humanity Dominates!? Air Raider (EDF6) Up & Coming: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Air Raider (EDF6) Up & Coming."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Humanity Dominates!? Fencer (EDF6) Up & Coming: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Fencer (EDF6) Up & Coming."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Just This Once: Special Appearance by The Lieutenant from EDF6
description: Adds the character "The Lieutenant."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - Humanity Dominates!? Wing Diver (EDF6) Up & Coming: Reskin
description: Adds the character "Wing Diver (EDF6) Up & Coming."

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 - I've Been Waiting: Special Appearance by The Professor from EDF6
description: Adds the character "The Professor."

name: Call of Duty Black Ops 6: Season 1
description: Ready to wreak havoc? The Black Ops 6 era is here. Prepare for a vast new season of content with five Multiplayer maps plus a festive Nuketown variant, seven new weapons, a brand-new Zombies map, and full Call of Duty: Warzone integration along with a new Resurgence map.

name: Spatial Ops
description: Sin descripción

name: Sociable Soccer 25
description: Embrace the excitement of the world's favorite sport in Sociable Soccer 25. Created by legendary game designer Jon Hare, Sociable Soccer 25 features his signature fast-paced, arcade-style and intuitive gameplay, enriched with multiplayer head-to-head matches and collectible player cards.

name: Eggconsole Ys MSX2
description: The landmark first game of an ongoing popular title. Master the 'half-character shift' and embark on an adventure in the land of Esteria!

name: Anime Girls: Gorgeous Girlfriend
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Monpic: The Hatchling Meets a Girl
description:
A heartwarming tale of the bond between a dragon hatchling and a girl transforming into a dragon!
"It would be wonderful if we could meet again someday."

name: Moto X Madness 2025: Ultimate Dirt Bike Championship
description:
Race, stunt, and dominate in the ultimate dirt bike challenge!
Master extreme parkour-inspired tracks and become the champion.

name: Neko Bento
description: Your perfect, cat-themed lunchbox puzzle is here!

name: Platform 9: No Way Out
description: In a world without escape, your mind is your only hope.

name: Blue Revolver: Double Action
description:
After a long time in development and a fruitful public beta, Blue Revolver: Double Action is now available for all players. Go forth and flourish!

Double Action is a large, free update to our game. We wanted to give players the best possible version of the game. There's rebalancing, new weapons, new content, a ton of new features and options -- including a super-smooth 120Hz mode!

name: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Chronicles: Battle for Greece
description: Chronicles features Age of Empires II gameplay set in antiquity. In Battle for Greece, the first chapter of this multi-part saga, fight with three new ancient civilizations and experience a grand narrative campaign, from the Ionian Revolt to the Peloponnesian War.

name: GirlDivers
description:
Join the GIRLDIVERS, humanity's last line of offense against an overwhelming alien menace.

Command sexy girl soldiers in a rich campaign full of randomly generated challenges, unforgiving enemies, sci-fi gadgets, and heavy firepower. Engaging in lewd punishments and rewards along the way.

name: Glitch Hero
description: A fatal error has trapped Ada’s father inside Codeland! As young Ada, wield the (virtually) mighty hammer.exe and debug the corrupted virtual world while learning basic coding concepts in an irreverent, fun and thrilling action puzzle adventure.

name: Drone World Tour: Flight Simulator
description: Take part in extreme drone racing and fly around the world in a new realistic drone simulator!

name: ATV Stunt Racing: Extreme Offroad Simulator
description: Extreme racing on dangerous tracks on powerful ATVs - set new records and take the top spot in the tournament table!

name: Methods 4: The Best Detective
description:
Methods is a visual novel with simple crime investigation gameplay where you examine evidence and answer multiple-choice questions about the solution.
And the whole game has been split into five apps for the mobile release, with 'Methods 4: The Best Detective' being the fourth part, and containing Chapters 61-85.

name: Arcade Archives: Konami's Table Tennis
description: Show your brilliance at table tennis!

name: Trientank
description: Sin descripción

name: Beanrise
description: First-person Action, Puzzle-Solving game. Unfold the Mysteries of two interconnected timelines. Discover the truth of the present within the past!

name: LEGO Horizon Adventures: Digital Deluxe Edition Content
description: Sin descripción

name: Iron Trails: Outlaw Pursuit
description: Step into a semi-open world where your mission is to deliver supplies to stations while fending off bandits. Explore a vast, relaxing environment while engaging in shootouts or simply enjoying the scenery. Each delivery strengthens your country’s war effort. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Hearts of Iron IV: Götterdämmerung
description: Build the industrial and research foundation to survive the world’s greatest conflict In Hearts of Iron IV: Götterdämmerung. In this expansion, players can write new histories of Germany, Austria, Hungary, Belgium, and Congo. Pursue exciting new research and military options, opening new paths for devastating new weapons and dramatic raids on strategic targets.

name: Heal The Survivors
description: A horde survival game where the object is to keep moving and stay awake to heal the hordes of patients chasing you.

name: Whole Note
description: A casual card game where you use note cards and various items to combine cards and create Whole Note Cards.

name: MeiQi 2024
description: Meiqi Mystery 2024 is a narrative puzzle game and the latest installment in the MeiQi series. Liu Qingchun, the bureau chief, personally takes charge of investigating the cases of the 403 Intelligence Division. This season presents you with six unique cases to solve.

name: Linked
description: Explore past and future, high and low in this short platformer game!

name: Irem Collection: Volume 2
description:
A retro port collection of classic Irem titles.
Air Duel
GunForce
GunForce 2

Published by ININ

name: LEGO Horizon Adventure: Shield Weaver Outfit
description: Sin descripción

name: Paperhead Ep. 0
description: In this cute cardboard world, something went horribly wrong... You wake up in a prison cell. A strange voice calls to you from the depths of dark corridors covered in runic symbols and blood. Reload your trusty shotgun and find out... WHY WOULD CARDBOARD... BLEED?

name: Nightmare House: The Original Mod
description:
Enter the haunting world of Nightmare House. This is the definitive edition of the highly acclaimed horror classic "Nightmare House 2".
Initially released in 2010 as a Source mod for Half-Life 2, the Nightmare House series captivated players with its intense atmosphere and gripping gameplay.

Wake up, it’s time for the real nightmare to begin. Make your way through a terrorizing house, uncover the secrets of a haunted hospital, fight through hordes of the undead, and try to escape Nightmare House.

name: Lando: Me? A Hero?
description: Thrown into a strange world by an angel, you’ll fight, adapt, and evolve in this action-packed roguelike. Combine insane powers, conquer new worlds with each run, and face relentless enemies. Will you rise as the hero—or fall trying?

name: Wuthering Waves: When the Night Knocks
description:
Version 1.4 of Wuthering Waves, which included:
• New characters: Camellya and Lumi
• New main event: Somnium Labyrinth
• New companion story for Camellya: Forking Path Among the Stars
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Peaks of Yore: The Great Alps
description: Take the Alpine Express and travel to the picturesque Einvald Valley to conquer the Great Alps' collection of crags, boulders, mountains, and more.

name: Cozy Together
description: A single player RPG, Inspired by Old School Runescape custom rulesets played by youtubers, such as Settled's "Tileman", FlippingOldSchools "Gold to unlock the map" and Gudi's "Game of Chance"

name: LEGO Horizon Adventures: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Butcherbird
description: 10 years have passed since a swarm of apocalyptic constructs wiped out most of humanity. Among the ashes of old Earth, a small band of survivors now find themselves with little else to do and far too much ammunition.

name: Voodoo Strikers
description: Unleash your competitive spirit with this local multiplayer sports game! Random fields and unique ball physics make each match different!

name: 4x4 Adventure Rocky Pathways
description: Can you conquer the toughest terrains?

name: Angry Neighbor Simulator
description: Silence the chaos, one swing at a time!

name: Curtain Call
description: Curtain Call: the latest game from the Noobs Want to Live devs. A strategic roguelite combining auto-battling and deck-building mechanics—recruit performers, take to the stage, and prepare for battle! Win glory and the rapturous applause of the audience. Take that curtain call!

name: Ragdoll Rumble
description: Ragdoll Rumble is a chaotic party game where toy wizards unleash wild spells in explosive spellcasting battles. Cast crazy abilities, outsmart your opponents, and prove you are the dominant doll!

name: Fuel Station: Drive & Pumping
description: Inherit an abandoned gas station in a desolate desert. Raise funds, renovate, and modernize the station. Expand your services to attract more customers. Test your entrepreneurial skills and maybe you'll become rich.

name: Backrooms: Spirits of the Forgotten
description: Escape the nightmare of the Backrooms—if you dare.

name: Parcel Master
description: Outsmart the Gridlock! Master the art of delivery in this deceptively simple puzzle game where every road counts!

name: Stellifier
description: Stellifier - an otome game inspired by older idols An idol drama game about an older group making a comeback from retirement, featuring a GxB/BxB/non-binary romance!

name: Debut Project: Cooking Cafe
description:
As a new cafe employee, you’ll be taking orders and completing challenges on your journey to create recipes which will take social media by storm. Share pics of your cooking to get Likes and boost your cafe’s rating. See if your culinary creativity can earn a million followers for the cafe!

Create up to 80 different menu items in the cafe kitchen! Experience the joys of cooking though 13 minigames in which you’ll choose flavors, toppings, and more!

name: Visa Control: USA Border Simulator
description: Will you uphold the law and make the right choices at the USA border?

name: Beyblade X Xone
description: 'BEYBLADE X XONE is a "Beyblade action" game that faithfully recreates the BEYBLADE X series (distributed by TOMY Company, Ltd.) that is popular among fans of all ages. Battle through intense Beybattles and aim for the top of The X!

name: Brothel Tycoon
description: Brothel Tycoon is a simulation game where you have to help Yvonne, in any way possible, including sex if necessary, to develop her business from a small cafe to a luxury entertainment place for adults.

name: Get Rich
description: "Get Rich" is a thrilling 2D roguelike shooter that plunges you into a corrupt metropolis teeming with danger and intrigue. Join the quest to get revenge and justice in a city riddled with corruption.

name: Untold Story
description: A classic 2D RPG in the style of Valiant and Aveyond, a tale about wealth, power and knowledge.

name: Divine Dynamo Flamefrit
description: "Divine Dynamo Flamefrit" is bringing back classic 2D action! Play as the hero Yuto in top-down slashing adventure stages, and pilot the magical robot Flamefrit for first-person boss battles! Master both styles of gameplay to restore peace to the parallel world of Hologard!

name: There's No Aliens
description: There's absolutely no aliens! We all know they are a myth and nobody ever seen one!

name: LEGO Horizon Adventures
description: Join machine hunter Aloy as she leads a colorful crew of heroes through the lush wilderness on a quest to save the world and learn the secrets of her past. Dive into boundless adventure, customize to your heart’s content, and take on action-packed battles solo or with friends in co-op.

name: Brutal Katana
description: BRUTAL KATANA is a short, satisfying, first-person parkour action platformer about quickly slicing statues in half.

name: Cain x Nica
description: ‘Cain × Nica’ is a visual novel about a pointless struggle doomed to failure from the start. But... doesn't that just make it more beautiful? The game features animated CGs and character sprites, a huge number of locations and soundtracks. Game length: 10-12 hours.

name: Talisman: Digital 5th Edition
description: Are you ready to experience Talisman like never before in Talisman: Digital 5th Edition? Play the newest digital adaptation of the iconic board game.

name: 49 Keys
description: It all began when you opened that letter. Penned by your late master, it details how you are now heir to his mysterious legacy. You set off for the island on which he'd spent his final years... and so a truly unsettling journey begins, a journey into the deepest secrets of magic and the occult.

name: Dig VR
description:
DIG VR captures the sheer joy, adrenaline and frustrations of life on a digger in an exciting experience for novices and pros. Featuring authentic, immersive controls that recreate the feeling of driving a real digger, DIG VR is a light-simulation game with a casual arcade-twist!

Grow your business in the charming town of Diglington, a place where everything can be fixed by the power of a digger. Take on a variety of jobs for the town's residents - from traditional construction jobs, to more obscure requests! Accompanying you is DIG FM, a dedicated radio station with a wide selection of music to brighten any day.

Progress from micro-sized to colossal diggers, with a diverse set of attachments to overcome any challenge. Dig in style by unlocking over 70 customization options to suit your aesthetic!

Available to play solo or with a friend, get hands on with the fast-paced mini-games or unwind in the sandbox mode. Then, discover a trove of Lost Treasure in a standalone mode where new items are added regularly.

Whether this is your first time operating a digger or you’re already a master, digging fortunes await!

name: 420Blaze It 2: Game of the Year
description: The long awaited sequel to the FPS hit is coming! You will no scope. You will blaze it. You will hallucinate some weird af s*** as you fight and xD inside your mind in 999fps to destroy the Illuminati and rescue the memes. Are you ready for 420BLAZEIT 2????!!1

name: Chloe the Cat
description: Jump, spin, and pounce your way through colorful worlds and challenging obstacles in this charming precision platformer! Collect coins to acquire new looks, scour through every corner to scavenge for food, and expertly leap and bounce past danger through a handcrafted adventure.

name: Inkbound: Supporter Pack - Rise of the Unbound
description: The Rise of the Unbound Supporter Pack rewards your support with eight exclusive cosmetic sets to customize your look. It includes one set for each character class to enhance your journey through the world of Inkbound.

name: Rage of the Dragons NEO
description: Engage in intense tag team battles in Rage of the Dragons NEO! Play the cult-classic among the fans of Fighting Games with brand-exclusive content!

name: Dungeon Dev
description: The demon lord, who has been secretly trading with the human kingdom's king, summons you and requests your help in developing a special dungeon. It's none other than a dungeon where is narrowly defeated by the heroes!

name: Yawnoc
description: Destroy hordes of strange machines that have invaded the forest. Yawnoc is a unique top-down shooter roguelite focused on immersion into the world of Conway's Game of Life and other cellular automata.

name: Werewolves 3: Evolution's End
description: In the wake of a horrific military raid on your woodland camp, the werewolf pack has become fractured and divided. When fate brings these disparate parties into contact once again, will your allies be able to put aside their differences long enough to survive the myriad dangers lying in wait?

name: Gas Station Simulator: Drive & Pumping
description: Welcome to 'Gas Station Simulator: Drive & Pumping'! Restore a forgotten gas station, grow your business, fuel cars, and open a convenience store. Become the gas station tycoon and pave your way to prosperity in this thrilling adventure!

name: Robot Detour
description: Wrap your head and wire around numerous puzzles of Robot Detour, and become the smartest and strongest robot of them all!

name: Black Mountain Kings
description: You were thrown in a strange world. You are alone, and you got nothing. What to do next? You decide it! Explore, defeat monsters, get riches, learn new abilities, discover secrets, and learn the truth.

name: Mobocratic Union
description: Welcome to Mobocratic Union, a thrilling political simulation game. This time, you'll leave the confines of a small, deserted island and venture into the grand spheres of the European Parliament. Get ready to make strategic decisions, form alliances, and shape the continent’s future!

name: Miniatures
description: Miniatures is a collection of strange tales where childhood imagination and reality merge with darker undercurrents of mystery and magic. Explore a vast seascape, build odd furniture, feed a lizard and play with sand castles.

name: Narona Sports: Supernatural
description: Unleash your competitive spirit and cuteness overload with this local multiplayer sports game! With randomly generated fields and different physics for each ball, each match will be completely different. Choose an adorable character and get ready to enjoy with family and friends!

name: Epic Auto Towers
description: Epic Auto Towers is a turn-based strategy game combining elements of autobattler, deckbuilder and roguelike. Purchase uncommon and rare Towers and build the strongest combo to withstand the monster assault! Discover unusual new Tower combinations as you come back for more.

name: Sunstone War
description: Harness Aztec bracelets, defend your village! Unique tower defense with epic freedom & diverse enemies. Unleash the Sunstone power now!

name: KKCKC
description: Become a Keyboard Key Character and become a Keyboard warrior who fights with 53 Keyboard Keys! 'KKCKC' is an action roguelike game that uses only the Keyboard to kill enemies! Survive your stronger enemies and pay back your colleagues' grudges!

name: Tiny Terrariums
description: Build terrariums for forest gnomes to live in, and play around in your creations as any one of the gnomes.

name: Little Big Adventure: Twinsen's Quest
description:
Step into Twinsun's fantastical world in this action-adventure remake! Little Big Adventure - Twinsen's Quest brings brand new visuals, new music by the original composer, and smoother gameplay to the iconic classic released back in 1994.

Embark on a Timeless Adventure, Reimagined

Twinsen is back in this remake featuring a new stylish makeover and modernized gameplay. Faithful to the original game, Little Big Adventure – Twinsen’s Quest takes you on an epic journey on a small planet harboring both magic and technology.

name: Genesis of a Small God
description: You have awoken as a small god. As you accumulate the faith and souls of your followers, you will learn incredible new abilities. Protect, guide your people and smite any threats that may arise. The fate of your world is in your hands.

name: Rooster Tale
description: Become a hero rooster and rescue the kidnapped chickens in this fast-paced 2D platformer game! Use your skills and quick reflexes to defeat robot enemies and navigate colorful, retro-inspired levels. Can you outsmart the cunning fox and save the day? Play now and find out!

name: Slam and Roll
description: Slam And Roll is true tribute to the frantic platform arcades games of the 90s, where intense gameplay and fast action are kings. Grab your stick, baseball bat, or best sports companion, solo or with a friend, and face off against the evil alien and their machines and save the world's best places.

name: Petit Island
description: Welcome to the beautiful and tropical Petit Island! Relive your grandpaw's youthful adventures by exploring the island and capturing beautiful photos in this heartwarming open-world photo exploration game. Preserve his memories before they fade away!

name: Sorry We're Closed
description: Sorry We're Closed is a nostalgic single player survival horror game with rich lore and character interactions that allow multiple endings. Following the end days of Michelle, explore unsettling locations using the environment to hide and survive. Use your demon gun to defend in first person.

name: Beyond the Darkness
description: Beyond The Darkness is a horror adventure game with puzzles where you help little girl Milly battle nightmares in the darkness to find her missing family. You will find yourself in bizarre worlds of memories, distorted by fears, and your only weapon will be the light of a small lamp...

name: Toys 'n' Traps
description: Protect Toy's Town in this action-filled tower defense. Build crazy traps, shoot enemies, lead your own minion army, obtain new traps and upgrade them to defend your car base across 4 different environments with visuals inspired in toys.

name: Catizens
description: Inspired by RimWorld and The Sims, Catizens is a colony management simulation game where you watch over unique cats with quirky personalities, as you help them build and grow their settlement while exploring new lands, facing off against wildlife and overcoming the challenges of each environment.

name: Bullet Runner
description: Fight your way through hordes of enemies, express your incredible rage through actions of pure violence. Use a wide variety of weapons to defeat the abominations of the mafia’s mysterious clone army, and figure out the heritage of your incredible rage and power.

name: Dragon Quest III: HD-2D Remake
description: DRAGON QUEST III HD-2D Remake is a stunning reimagining of the beloved masterpiece and narrative beginning to The Erdrick Trilogy.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Mindcop
description: Mindcop is a non-linear “whodunnit“ detective game. It mixes a story driven adventure with real-time puzzle gaming. As the infamous Mindcop, you can dive into the minds of your suspects to uncover their secrets and unravel their lies.

name: Smoothcade
description: Smoothcade is a cute “clear the screen” modern-arcade game that features co-op gameplay for up to four players. Recover the missing golden blend through 100 platform-jumping, puzzle-solving levels in story mode - consisting of handcrafted levels and a ton of fruity critters!

name: Ved
description: Ved is a story-driven, hand-drawn RPG with a unique turn-based combat system and roguelite elements. Set in two different worlds, VED tells the story of Cyrus, a young hero who sets out on a quest to become a master of sword and magic, and save everything he knows from destruction.

name: WWE 2K24: WCW Pack
description:
The WCW Pack includes five, larger-than-life Legends from the WCW era: Diamond Dallas Page, Iron Sheik, Mr. Perfect, Great Muta, and Lex Luger.

Each playable WCW Superstar comes with its own Pink Diamond MyFACTION card. The WCW pack is included with the WWE 2K24 Season Pass.

name: Astroneer: Glitchwalkers Edition
description: This bundle includes the ASTRONEER base game and the Glitchwalkers DLC.

name: Astroneer: Glitchwalkers - Deluxe Edition
description: This bundle includes the ASTRONEER base game, Glitchwalkers DLC and Glitchwalkers Deluxe Cosmetic Pack.

name: Beautiful Sakura: Running Club
description:
A continuation of Kaito's journey, where he embarks on a new hobby. This visual novel delves into themes of love, friendship, and self-discovery.

Players once again step into Kaito's shoes, guiding him through the ups and downs of his new life, where every run brings him closer to understanding himself and those around him.

name: Anomaly Patroller
description: Story: You are being hired to become an anomaly patroller. Your job is to investigate the area that is being haunted by anomalous activity through the special protocol. If there's an anomaly, press the button then proceed. If there's no anomaly, proceed without pressing the button. You must make it to area 20 to finish the protocol. Good luck.

name: Crusty Proto
description:
Unknown incomplete and glitchy game, with build date roughly around 1997, found in a pack of CD bought in a garage lot.
It tries to mimic Resident Evil very hard, as it was big hit at the time.

Though in this state, i think i know who to blame, why it didn't make it to release...

name: Years Apart
description: Sin descripción

name: Mubosama
description: We were spending our usual summer—catching beetles, chasing dogs, finding good spots. And then, we learned about her existence. MUBOSAMA is an adventure game based on urban legends.

name: Yard Resistance
description: Don't let the UFOs disturb your Yard. Eat their shield. Shoot them down.

name: Interstate 35
description: A visual novel exploring a near-apocalyptic vision of North Texas, told through the poetic words of a young woman going home.

name: Warcraft Remastered Battle Chest
description: Celebrate 30 years of Warcraft history and travel back to the beginning with remastered versions of Warcraft I and II and a newly updated Warcraft III Reforged.

name: Warcraft III: Reforged - Version 2.0
description: In celebration of the 30th anniversary of the release of Warcraft: Orcs & Humans, Warcraft III: Reforged has been updated to version 2.0, which includes many fixes, improvements, and nods to Warcraft’s history.

name: Warcraft II: Remastered
description:
Captain your own fleet in the second Warcraft title created in 1995, now remastered with vivid, all-new visuals and modernized controls!

War between orc and humans rages on across the seas, and the fate of the world hangs in the balance as the great tacticians of the Horde and the Alliance clash. Only one thing is certain: winning this war will demand unprecedented cunning, courage, and nerves of steel.

name: Warcraft I: Remastered
description:
Journey back to the beginning of a 30-year legacy with the first Warcraft story created in 1994, now remastered with vivid, all-new visuals and modernized controls!

Experience the inciting war between Orcs and Humans that shook Azeroth to its core. Defend the realm as the noble Alliance, or seek to conquer it as the bloodthirsty Horde across thrilling faction campaigns or custom skirmish games. Whichever side you take, there has never been a better time to charge into the legendary battles of Azeroth’s greatest heroes in the Warcraft universe

name: Limestone
description: 3 industrial-themed maps for doom2

name: Fonzi Fuddy: Ace Defective
description: Fonzi Fuddy: Ace Defective is a game where a detective must explore around, rewind people's testimonies, and find clues to pin their own crime onto someone else.

name: Wittle Mistakes
description: Wittle Mistakes is a mechanics-based third-person 3D adventure where players navigate the trials of infancy within the Mother Corporation. Unveil the dark secrets that Mother has been hiding. The playpen awaits!

name: Puzzle Player
description: Dive into a seductive tile-based puzzle game where you slide, rotate, and match tiles to unveil stunning images of nudes. Each challenge blends strategy and creativity, making it an enticing experience for puzzle lovers. Unlock your passion and indulge in this captivating journey of art and allure!

name: Battle Squares
description: Channel your 4 corners and start aiming! Battle squares is an online 8 directional 2D Shooter. Pick your weapons, colored identity and embody the 4 corners! Tumble, Bounce, Recoil and FIGHT!

name: Bible Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Bible Jigsaw Puzzle offers a relaxing and uplifting experience as you piece together biblical scenes. Challenge yourself and climb the rankings to compete with friends and players worldwide, while exploring the beauty of the Holy Scriptures.

name: Astroneer: Glitchwalkers
description:
Travel to the Aeoluz system in pursuit of a grand threat in Astroneer: Glitchwalkers.

The Glitchwalkers DLC is our first ever expansion to Astroneer, offering a new space to explore as well as new narrative, gameplay, and mysteries to uncover.

name: Tribal Ritual
description: Every unwed girl of the tribe had to undergo the initiation. The tribesmen would take her deep into the jungle and leave her tied up. Around noon, the creature would come. Reptile & human, male & female, tits & cock, all at the same time. It would do things to the girl that she would never forget...

name: Sudoku Topology
description: Explore classic sudoku variant rules on 3D boards ranging from cubes and spheres to dodecahedron and the Klein bottle. Experience beautiful logic of handcrafted puzzles where no guessing is required. Or design your own 3D sudoku puzzles and share them with the world!

name: Hidden Oddities
description: Hidden Oddities is a cosy Hidden object game where you search in the nook and crannies across lush miniature landscapes, it's amazing what you might find in some of the oddest of places

name: RSSU: Retro Style Soviet Undies
description: RSSU - Retro Style Soviet Undies is an adult visual novel with a unique story, made in pinup style and filled with humor, sex and romance. Go back to the 80s, meet beautiful Soviet women and discover the exciting mystery of the town of Maryino.

name: Fatal Falls
description: In Fatal Falls you explore the dark secrets of "The Grand Elysium", a posh luxury hotel. Interact with its guests, drink a cocktail at the bar, peruse the noble premises – the choice is yours! Just make sure you choose appropriate answers when talking to people who are mentally unstable...

name: Scarlet Defiance: The Wall Between Us
description: In this dark fantasy yuri visual novel, follow the events that lead up to the fateful meeting of two young women. Accompany Sofia, a human revolutionary, and Vlatka, the vampire princess, as they navigate political upheaval, forbidden romance, and the ugliness of war.

name: Temtem: Swarm
description: A survivor-like bullet heaven with online co-op up to 3 players

name: Globalism
description: A global strategy for the 21st century. The threat of nuclear war, economic inequality, overpopulation of some regions and extinction of other regions, the crisis of capitalism... Find your solutions to the current problems of mankind!

name: Is This Game Trying to Kill Me?
description: An old shack deep in a dense forest, a strange computer and a game that's trying to kill you!

name: Envyus
description: Embark on a journey looking for redemption, truth and your freedom, on a continent filled with challenges to be overcome, with main and side quests that will provide you with various unique and powerful equipments and skills.

name: Dungeon Inn
description: The turn-based stategy management game giving the delightful tension. The Player opened an inn for two guilds with the dungeon just around the corner. Let's make a lot of money. The two guilds are hostile, but it's OK if they don't get caught!

name: Mindbug Online
description: Summon hybrid creatures and send them to battle against your opponent. But be careful: your opponent may use one of their Mindbugs to take control of it. Outwit your opponent in a fascinating tactical duel in which having the best cards and playing them at the wrong time can be deadly for yourself.

name: Flawless Darkness
description: Flawless Darkness is designed so that blind and non-blind people can have the same play experience. That's why you play the game only with sound, with no graphics at all. Players will have a special experience just escaping the maze in darkness.

name: Mind Over Magnet
description: An attractive puzzle platformer where you use magnetism to escape a factory. Meet a cast of magnet characters and work together to solve logical conundrums.

name: Songs of Silence
description: Songs of Silence is an Art Nouveau-inspired fantasy strategy game with a unique mix of turn-based kingdom management, hero development and real-time combat.

name: Codex Lost
description: The new open world, spellcasting action-RPG. The grimoires have been stolen, civilisation is in ruins. Rise, Curator! Craft ancient elemental magics and challenge the great lords who threaten to fracture reality itself.

name: Void Sols
description: 2D top-down minimalist souls-like. Explore the jail you awaken inside of in this dark and atmospheric action game.

name: I am Future
description: I Am Future is a relaxing survival game about building a cozy rooftop camp amid a flooded post-apocalyptic city. Set up a farm, cook delicious food, dismantle tools for crafting resources, automate chores by recruiting cute robots, and uncover the mystery behind the catastrophe.

name: Train Sim World 5: MBTA Commuter - Boston - Worcester
description: Take charge of passenger traffic in dashing MBTA Purple and run through the commuter suburbs of Central Massachusetts. Operate the sleek HSP46 on the bustling rails out of Boston South and out onto the busy Framingham/Worcester Line in Train Sim World 5!

name: Farming Simulator 25: Year 1 Bundle
description:
FS25+Year 1 Season Pass.
PRE-ORDER GET FREE MacDon Pack!
New crops alongside new maps in Asia, North America & Europe. With the Year 1 Bundle, compared to buying the content separately, you save more than 25%!
